GSP33brssbh3u:344: iṣṭādikāriṇāmitareṣāṃ ca samānagatitvaṃ na yuktamiti cet / na /
GSP33brssbh3u:346: saṃyamane tv anubhūyetareṣāmārohāv arohau tadgatidarśanāt / BBs_3,1.13 /
GSP33brssbh3u:352: yathā kaścidvṛkṣamārohati puṣpaphalopādānāyaiva na niṣprayojanaṃ nāpi patanāyaiva /
GSP33brssbh3u:355: te tu saṃyamanaṃ yamālayamavagāhya svaduṣkṛtānurūpā yāmīryātanā anubhūya punarevemaṃ lokaṃ pratyavaronti /
GSP33brssbh3u:358: tathāhi yamavacanasarūpā śrutiḥ prayatāmaniṣṭādikāriṇāṃ yamavaśyatāṃ darśayati- 'na sāṃparāyaḥ pratibhāti bālaṃ pramādyantaṃ vittamohena mūḍham
GSP33brssbh3u:359: ayaṃ loko nāsti para iti mānī punaḥ punarvaśamāpadyate me' (kaṭha. 2.6) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:360: 'vaivasvataṃ saṃgamanaṃ janānām' ityevañjātīyakaṃ ca bahveva yamavaśyatāprāptiliṅgaṃ bhavati // 13 //
GSP33brssbh3u:362: apica manuvyāsaprabhṛtayaḥ śiṣṭāḥ saṃyamane pure yamāyattaṃ kapūyakarmavipākaṃ smaranti nāciketopākhyānādiṣu // 14 //
GSP33brssbh3u:364: apica sapta narakā rauravapramukhā duṣkṛtaphalopabhogabhūmitvena smaryante paurāṇikaiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:368: yāvatā teṣu rauravādiṣvanye citraguptādayo nānādhiṣṭhātāraḥ smaryanta iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:372: yamaprayuktā eva hi te citraguptādayo 'dhiṣṭhātāraḥ smaryante // 16 //
GSP33brssbh3u:375: ityasya praśnasya prativacanāvasare śrūyate- 'athaitayoḥ pathorna katareṇacana tānīmāni kṣudrāṇyasakṛdāvartīni bhūtāni bhavanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:376: jāyasva mriyasvetyetattṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ tenāsau loko na saṃpūryate' (chā. 5.10.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:380: vidyākarmaṇī hi devayānapitṛyāṇayoḥ pathoḥ pratipattau prakṛte /
GSP33brssbh3u:381: 'tadya itthaṃ viduḥ' iti vidyā tayā pratipattavyo devayānaḥ panthāḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:383: iti karma tena pratipattavyaḥ pitṛyāṇaḥ panthāḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:385: etaduktaṃ bhavati- ye na vidyāsādhanena devayāne patyadhikṛtā nāpi karmaṇā pitṛyāṇe teṣāmeṣa kṣudrajantulakṣaṇo 'sakṛdāvartī tṛtīyaḥ panthā bhavatīti /
GSP33brssbh3u:388: te 'pi candrabimbamāruhya tato 'varuhya kṣudrajantutvaṃ pratipatsyanta iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:391: apica sarveṣu prayatsu candralokaṃ prāpnuvatsvasau lokaḥ prayadbhiḥ saṃpūryetetyataḥ praśnaviruddhaṃ prativacanaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:392: tathāhi prativacanaṃ dātavyaṃ yathāsau loko na saṃpūryate /
GSP33brssbh3u:396: śrutistu tṛtīyasthānasaṃkīrtanenāsaṃpūraṇaṃ darśayati- 'etattṛtīyaṃ sthānaṃ tenāsau loko na saṃpūryate' (chā. 5.10.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:401: ye vai kecidadhikṛtā asmāllokātprayanti candramasameva te sarve gacchantīti // 17 //
GSP33brssbh3u:406: na tṛtīye sthāne dehalābhāya pañcasaṃkhyāniyama āhutīnāmādartavyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:408: tathāhyantareṇaivāhutisaṃkhyāniyamaṃ varṇitena prakāreṇa tṛtīyasthānaprāptirupalabhyate 'jāyasva mriyasvetyetattṛtīyaṃ sthānam' (chā. 5.10.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:412: apica pañcamyāmāhutāvapāṃ puruṣavacastvamupadiśyate nāpañcamyāmāhutau puruṣavacastvaṃ pratiṣidhyate,
GSP33brssbh3u:414: tatra yeṣāmārohāvarohau saṃbhavatasteṣāṃ pañcamyāmāhutau deha udbhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssbh3u:420: dhṛṣṭadyumnādīnāṃ tu yoṣitpuruṣaviṣaye dve apyāhutī na staḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:422: balākāpyantareṇaiva retaḥsekaṃ garbhaṃ dhatta iti lokarūḍhiḥ // 19 //
GSP33brssbh3u:424: apica caturvidhe bhūtagrāme jarāyujāṇḍajasvedajodbhijjalakṣaṇe svedajodbhijjayorantareṇaiva grāmyadharmamutpattidarśanādāhutisaṃkhyānādaro bhavati
GSP33brssbh3u:428: nanu 'teṣāṃ khalveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ trīṇyeva bījāni bhavanti aṇḍajaṃ jīvajamudbhijjam' (chā. 6.3.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:429: atra trividha eva bhūtagrāmaḥ śrūyate kathaṃ caturvidhatvaṃ bhūtagrāmasya pratijñātamiti /
GSP33brssbh3u:435: sthāvarodbhedāttu vilakṣaṇo jaṅgamodbheda ityanyatra svedajodbhijjayorbhedavāda ityavirodhaḥ // 21 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh3u:442: vāyirbhūtvā dhūmo bhavati dhūmo bhūtvābhraṃ bhavatyabhraṃ bhūtvā megho bhūtvā pravarṣati' (chā. 5.10.5) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:450: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ākāśādisāmyaṃ pratipadyanta iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:451: candramaṇḍale yadaṃmayaṃ śarīramupabhogārthamārabdhaṃ tadupabhogakṣaye sati pravilīyamānaṃ sūkṣmamākāśasamaṃ bhavati tato vāyorvaśameti tato dhūmādibhiḥ saṃpṛcyata iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:471: tathāhi vrīhyādibhāvāpatteranantaraṃ viśinaṣṭi- 'ato vai khalu durniṣprapataram'
GSP33brssbh3u:475: tadatra duḥkhaṃ niṣprapatanaṃ pradarśayanpūrveṣu sukhaṃ niṣprapatanaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:481: tasminnevārohe pravarṣaṇānantaraṃ paṭhyate- 'ta iha vrīhiyavā oṣadhivanaspatayastilamāṣā iti jāyante' (chā. 5.10.6)
GSP33brssbh3u:483: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimasminnavadhau sthāvarajātyāpannāḥ sthāvarasukhaduḥkhabhājo 'nuśāyino bhavatyāhosvitkṣetrajñāntarādhiṣṭhiteṣu sthāvaraśarīreṣu saṃśleṣamātraṃ gacchantīti /
GSP33brssbh3u:491: yathā śvayoniṃ vā sūkarayoniṃ vā camḍālayoniṃ veti mukhyamevānuśayināṃ śvādijanma tatsukhaduḥkhānvitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:492: evaṃ vrīhyādiṣu saṃsargamātramanuśayinaḥ pratipadyante na tatsukhaduḥkhānvitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:494: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ anyairjīvairadhiṣṭhiteṣu vrīhyādiṣu saṃsargamātramanuśayinaḥ pratipadyante na tatsukhaduḥkhabhājo bhavanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:502: yathākāśādiṣu pravarṣaṇānteṣu na kañcitkarmavyāpāraṃ parāmṛśatyevaṃ vrīhyādijanmanyapi /
GSP33brssbh3u:504: yatra tu sukhaduḥkhabhāktvamabhipraiti parāmṛśati tatra karmavyāpāraṃ ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ kapūyacaraṇā iti ca /
GSP33brssbh3u:505: apica mukhye 'nuśayināṃ vrīhyādijanmani vrīhyādiṣu lūyamāneṣu kaṇḍyamāneṣu pacyamāneṣu bhakṣyamāṇeṣu ca tadabhimānino 'nuśayinaḥ pravaseyuḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:506: yo hi jīvo yaccharīramabhimanyate sa tasminpīḍyamāne pravasatīti prasiddham /
GSP33brssbh3u:513: aśuddham iti cen na śabdāt / BBs_3,1.25 /
GSP33brssbh3u:514: yatpunaruktaṃ paśuhiṃsādiyogādaśuddhamādhvarikaṃ karma tasyāniṣṭamapi phalamavakalpata ityato mukhyamevānuśayināṃ vrīhyādijanmāstu tatra gauṇī kalpanānarthiketi tatparihriyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:516: ayaṃ dharmo 'yamadharma iti śāstrameva vijñāne kāraṇam /
GSP33brssbh3u:518: yasmindeśe kāle nimitte ca yo dharmo 'nuṣṭhīyate sa eva deśakālanimittāntareṣvadharmo bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:519: tena śāstrādṛte dharmādharmaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ na kasyacidasti /
GSP33brssbh3u:520: śāstrācca hiṃsānugrahādyātmako jyotiṣṭomo dharma ityavadhāritaḥ sa kathamaśuddha iti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33brssbh3u:521: nanu 'na hiṃsyātsarvā bhūtāni' iti śāstrameva bhūtaviṣayāṃ hiṃsāmadharma ityavagamayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:528: tena na tasya pratirūpaṃ phalaṃ jātisthāvaratvam /
GSP33brssbh3u:534: retaḥsigbhāva āmnāyate - 'yo yo hyannamatti yo retaḥ siñcati tadbhūya eva bhavati' (chā. 5.10.6) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:541: atha retaḥsigbhāvasyānantaraṃ yonau niṣikte retasi yoneradhikaśarīramanuśayināmanuśayaphalopabhogāya jāyata ityāha śāstram - ''tadya iha ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ' (chāya 5.10.7) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:542: tasmādapyavagamyate nāvarohe vrīhyādibhāvāvasare taccharīrameva sukhaduḥkānvitaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33brssbh3u:549: atikrīnte pāde pañcāgnividyāmudāhṛtya jīvasya saṃsāragatiprabhedaḥ prapañcitaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:552: ityupakramya 'na tatra rathā na rathayogā na panthāno bhavantyatha rathānrathayogānpathaḥ sṛjate' (bṛ. 4.3.10) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:553: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ prabodha iva svapne 'pi pāramārthikī sṛṣṭirāhosvinmāyāmayīti /
GSP33brssbh3u:559: kutaḥ - yataḥ pramāṇabhūtā śrutirevamāha 'atha rathānnathayogānpathaḥ sṛjate' (bṛ. 4,3.10) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:562: apicaike śākhino 'sminneva saṃdhye sthāne kāmānāṃ nirmātāramātmānamāmananti- 'ya eṣa supteṣu jāgarti kāmaṃ kāmaṃ puruṣo nirmimāṇaḥ' (ka. 5.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:563: putrādayaśca tatra kāmā abhipreyante kāmyanta iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:567: iti prakṛteṣu tatra tatra putrādiṣu kāmaśabdasya prayuktatvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:570: ityādi, tadviṣaya eva ca vākyaśeṣo 'pi- 'tadeva śukraṃ tadbrahma tadevāmṛtamucyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:571: tasmiṃllokāḥ śritāḥ sarve tadu nātyeti kaścana'' (ka. 5.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:572: prājñakartṛkā ca sṛṣṭistathyarūpā samadhigatā jāgaritāśrayā tathā svapnāśrayāpi sṛṣṭirbhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh3u:573: tathāca śrutiḥ - atho khalvāhurjāgaritadeśa evāsyaiṣa iti yāni hyeva jāgratpaśyati tāni suptaḥ (bṛ. 4.3.14)
GSP33brssbh3u:593: nahi suptasya jantoḥ kṣaṇamātreṇa yojanaśatāntaritaṃ deśaṃ paryetuṃ viparyetuṃ ca tataḥ sāmarthyaṃ saṃbhāvyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:594: kvacicca pratyāgamanavarjitaṃ svapnaṃ śrāvayati kuruṣvahamadya śayāno nidrayābhiplutaḥ svapne pañcālānabhigataścāsminpratibuddhaśceti /
GSP33brssbh3u:595: dehāccedapeyātpañcāleṣu pratihudhyeta na tānasāvabhigata iti kuruṣveva tu pratibudhyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:596: yena cāyaṃ dehena deśāntaramaśnuvāno manyate tamanye pārśvasthāḥ śayanadeśa eva paśyanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:597: yathābhūtāni cāyaṃ deśāntarāṇi svapne paśyati na tāni tathābhūtānyeva bhavanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:599: darśayati ca śrutirantareva dehe svapnam- 'sa yatraitatsvapnyayā carati' ityupakramya 'sve śarīre yathākāmaṃ parivartate' (bṛ. 2.1.18) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:601: yo hi vasannapi śarīre na tena prayojanaṃ karoti sa bahiriva śarīrādbhavatīti /
GSP33brssbh3u:603: kālavisaṃvādo 'pi ca svapne bhavati rajanyāṃ supto vāsaraṃ bhārate varṣe manyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:605: nimittānyapi ca svapne na buddhaye karmaṇe vocitāni vidyante /
GSP33brssbh3u:607: rathādinirvartane 'pi kuto 'sya nimeṣamātreṇa sāmarthyaṃ dāruṇī vā /
GSP33brssbh3u:611: ratho 'yamiti hi kadācitsvapne nirdhāritaḥ kṣaṇena manuṣyaḥ saṃpadyate manuṣyo 'yamiti nirdhāritaḥ kṣaṇena vṛkṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:612: spaṣṭaṃ cābhāvaṃ rathādīnāṃ svapne śrāvayati śāstram - ''na tatra rathā na rathayogā na panthāno bhavanti' (bṛ. 4.3.10) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:617: sūcakaśca hi śruter ācakṣate ca tadvidaḥ / BBs_3,2.4 /
GSP33brssbh3u:621: tathāhi śrūyate - 'yadā karmasu kāmyeṣu striyaṃ svapneṣu paśyati /
GSP33brssbh3u:623: tathā puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇadantaṃ paśyati sa enaṃ hanti ityevamādibhiḥ svapnairacirajīvitvamāvedyata iti śrāvayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:624: ācakṣate ca svapnādhyāyavidaḥ - 'kuñjarārohaṇādīni svapne dhanyāni kharayānādīnyadhanyāni' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:626: tatrāpi bhavatu nāma sūcyamānasya vastunaḥ satyatvaṃ,
GSP33brssbh3u:629: yaduktam 'āha hi' iti tadevaṃ sati bhāktaṃ vyākhyātavyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:632: evaṃ nimittamātratvādevātsupto rathādīnsṛjate sa hi karteti cocyate,
GSP33brssbh3u:635: apica jāgarite viṣayendriyasaṃyogādādityādijyotirvyatikarāccātmanaḥ svayañjyotiṣṭvaṃ durvivecanamiti tadvivecanāya svapna upanyastaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:636: tatra yadi rathādisṛṣcivacanaṃ śrutyā nīyeta tadā svayañjyotiṣṭvaṃ na nirṇītaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:637: tasmādrathādyabhāvavacanaṃ śrutyā rathādisṛṣṭivacanaṃ tu bhaktyeti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:641: śrutyantare 'svayaṃ vihatya svayaṃ nirmāya svena bhāsā jyotiṣā prasvapiti' (bṛ. 4.3.9)
GSP33brssbh3u:644: iti prasiddhānuvajjīva evāyaṃ kāmānāṃ nirmātā saṃkīrtyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:645: tasya tu vākyaśeṣeṇa tadeva śukraṃ tadbrahmeti jīvabhāvaṃ vyāvartya brahmabhāva upadiśyate - 'tattvamasi' (chā. 6.9.4)
GSP33brssbh3u:656: parābhidhyānāt tu tirohitaṃ tato hyasya bandhaviparyayau / BBs_3,2.5 /
GSP33brssbh3u:658: tatraivaṃ sati yathāgnivisphuliṅgayoḥ samāne dahanaprakāśanaśaktī bhavata evaṃ jīveśvarayorapi jñānaiśvaryaśaktī,
GSP33brssbh3u:667: kutaḥ - tato hīśvarāddhetorasya jīvasya bandhamokṣau bhavataḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:669: tathāca śrutiḥ - 'jñātvā devaṃ sarvapāśāpahāniḥ kṣīṇaiḥ kleśairjanmamṛtyuprahāṇiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:678: asti cātropamā yathāgnerdahanaprakāśanasaṃpannasyāpyaraṇitasya dahanaprakāśane tirohite bhavato yathā vā bhasmacchannasya /
GSP33brssbh3u:681: nanvasya eva jīva īśvarādastu tiraskṛtajñānaiśvaryatvātkiṃ dehayogakalpanayā /
GSP33brssbh3u:689: ataśca na sāṃkalpikī jīvasya svapne rathādisṛṣṭirghaṭate /
GSP33brssbh3u:690: yadi ca sāṃkalpikī svapne rathādisṛṣṭiḥ syānnaivāniṣṭaṃ kaścitsvapnaṃ paśyet /
GSP33brssbh3u:692: yatpunaruktaṃ jāgaritadeśaśrutiḥ svapnasya satyatvaṃ sthāpayatīti na tatsāmyavacanaṃ satyatvābhiprāyaṃ svayañjyotiṣṭvavirodhāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:697: tadabhāvo nāḍīṣu tacchruter ātmani ca / BBs_3,2.7 /
GSP33brssbh3u:700: kvacicchrūyate- 'tadyatraitatsuptaḥ samastaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānātyāsu tadā nāḍīṣu sṛpo bhavati' (chā. 8.6.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:701: anyatra tu nāḍīrevānukramya śrūyate - 'tābhiḥ pratyavasṛpya purītati śete' (bṛ. 2.1.19) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:702: tathānyatra nāḍīrevānukramya 'tāsu tadā bhavati yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' (kauṣī. 4.19) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:704: tathānyatra 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati svamapīto bhavati' (chā. 6.8.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:705: 'prājñenātmanā saṃpariśvakto na bāhyaṃ kiñcana veda nāntaram' (bṛ. 4.3.21) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh3u:706: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimetāni nāḍyādīni parasparanirapekṣāṇi bhinnāni suṣuptisthānānyāhosvitparasparāpekṣayaikaṃ suṣuptisthānamasti /
GSP33brssbh3u:710: nāḍyādīnāṃ tvekārthatā suṣuptau dṛśyate - 'nāḍīśu sṛpto bhavati' (chā. 8.6.3)
GSP33brssbh3u:712: (bṛ. 2.1.19) iti ca tatra tatra saptamīnirdeśasya tulyatvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:713: nanu naivaṃ sati saptamīnirdeśo dṛśyate - 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati' (chā. 6.8.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:716: vākyaśeṣo hi tatrāyatanaiṣī jīvaḥ sadupasarpatītyāha - 'anyatrāyatanamalabdhvā prāṇamevopaśrayate' (chā. 6.8.2)
GSP33brssbh3u:717: iti prāṇaśabdena tatra prakṛtasya sata upādanāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:719: saptamīnirdeśo 'pi tatra vākyaśeṣe dṛśyate - 'sati saṃpadya na viduḥ sati saṃpadyāmahe' (chā. 6.9.2) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:720: sarvatra ca viśeṣavijñānoparamalakṣaṇaṃ suṣuptaṃ na viśiṣyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:722: evaṃ prāpte pratipādyate - tadabhāvo nāḍīṣvātni ceti /
GSP33brssbh3u:723: tadabhāva iti tasya prakṛtasya svapnadarśanasyābhāvaḥ suṣuptamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:724: nāḍīṣvātmani ceti samuccayenaitāni nāḍyādīni svāpāyopaiti na vikalpenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:726: tathāhi - sarveṣāmeva nāḍyādīnāṃ tatra tatra suṣuptisthānatvaṃ śrūyate tacca masuccaye saṃgṛhītaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:732: tathehāpi nāḍīṣu purītati brahmaṇi ca svapitītyetadupapadyate samuccayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:733: tathāca śrutiḥ - 'tāsu tadā bhavati yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati' (kauṣī. 4.19)
GSP33brssbh3u:734: iti samuccayaṃ nāḍīnāṃ prāṇasya ca suṣuptau śrāvayatyekavākyopādānāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:736: yatrāpi nirapekṣā iva nāḍīḥ suptisthānatvena śrāvayati - 'āsu tadā nāḍīṣu sṛpto bhavati' (chā. 8.6.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:737: tatrāpi pradeśāntaraprasiddhasya brahmaṇo 'pratiṣedhānnāḍīdvāreṇaiva brahmaṇyevāvatiṣṭhata iti pratīyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:740: yo hi gaṅgayā sāgaraṃ gacchati gata eva sa gaṅgāyāṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:745: bravīti ca pāpmasparśābhāve hetum - tejasā nāḍīgatena pittākhyenābhivyāptakaraṇo na bāhyānviṣayānīkṣata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:749: brahmaṇā hi tadā saṃpanno bhavati nāḍīdvāreṇātastaṃ na kaścana pāpmāna spṛśatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:750: brahmasamapattiśca pāpmasparśābhāve hetuḥ samadhigataḥ - 'sarve pāpmāno 'ta nivartante 'pahatapāpmā hyeṣa brahmalokaḥ' (chā.
GSP33brssbh3u:752: evañca sati pradeśāntaraprasiddhena brahmaṇā suṣuptisthānenānugato nāḍīnāṃ samuccayaḥ samadhigato bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:753: tathā purītato 'pi brahmaprakriyāyāṃ saṃkīrtanāttadanuguṇameva suptisthānatvaṃ vijñāyate - 'ya eṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśastasmiñchete' (bṛ. 2.1.17)
GSP33brssbh3u:754: iti hṛdayākāśe suptisthāne prakṛta idamucyate 'purītati śete' (bṛ. 2.1.19) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:756: tadantarvartinyāpi hṛdayākāśe śayānaḥ śakyate purītati śeta iti vaktum /
GSP33brssbh3u:757: prākāraparikṣipte 'pi pure vartamānaḥ prākāre vartata ityucyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:758: hṛdayākāśasya ca brahmatvaṃ samadhigatam - 'dahara uttarebhyaḥ' (bra.sū. 1.3.14) ityatra /
GSP33brssbh3u:762: evametāsu śrutiṣu trīṇyeva suṣuptisthānāni saṃkīrtitāni nāḍyaḥ purītadbrahma ceti /
GSP33brssbh3u:765: apica nāḍyaḥ purītadvā jīvasyopādhyādhāra eva bhavati tatrāsya karaṇāni vartanta iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:768: brahmādhāratvamapyasya suṣupte naivādhārādheyabhedābhiprāyeṇocyate kathaṃ tarhi tādātmyābhiprāyeṇa /
GSP33brssbh3u:769: yata āha - 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati svamapīto bhavati' (chā. 6.8.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:772: apica na kadācijjīvasya brahmaṇā saṃpattirnāsti svarūpasyānapāyitvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:774: ataśca suptāvasthāyāṃ kadācitsatāṃ saṃpadyate kadācinna saṃpadyata ityayuktam /
GSP33brssbh3u:775: apica sthānavikalpābhyupagame 'pi viśeṣavijñānopalakṣaṇaṃ tāvatsuṣuptaṃ na kvacidviśiṣyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:779: nāḍīṣu puratīti ca śayānasya na kiñcidavijñāne kāraṇaṃ śakyaṃ vijñātuṃ,
GSP33brssbh3u:780: bhedaviṣayatvāt 'yatra vā anyadiva syāttatrānyo 'nyatpaśyet' (bṛ. 4.3.31) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:784: yathā viṣṇumitraḥ pravāsī svagṛhaṃ na paśyati /
GSP33brssbh3u:786: upādhigatamevātidūrādikāraṇamavijñāna iti yadyucyeta tathāpyupādherupaśāntatvātsatyeva saṃpanno na vijānatīti yuktam /
GSP33brssbh3u:788: nahi nāḍyaḥ suptisthānaṃ purītadvetyanena vijñānena kiñcitprayojanamasti /
GSP33brssbh3u:792: tena tu vijñānena prayojanamasti jīvasya brahmātmatvāvadhāraṇaṃ svapnajāgaritavyavahāravimuktatvāvadhāraṇaṃ ca /
GSP33brssbh3u:795: yasmāccātmaiva suptisthānamata eva ca kāraṇānnityavadevāsmādātmanaḥ prabodhaḥ svāpādhikāre śiṣyate - 'kuta etadāgāt' (bṛ. 2.1.16)
GSP33brssbh3u:796: ityasya praśnasya prativacanāvasare 'yathāgneḥ kṣudrā visphuliṅgā vyuccārantyevamevaitasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ' (bṛ. 2.1.20) ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh3u:797: 'sata āgamya na viduḥ sata āgacchāmahe' (chā. 6.10.2) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh3u:798: vikalpyamāneṣu tu suṣuptisthāneṣu kadācinnāḍībhyaḥ pratibudhyate kadācitpurītataḥ kadācidātmana ityaśāsiṣyat /
GSP33brssbh3u:802: tasyāḥ punaḥ satsaṃpatteḥ pratibudhyamānaḥ kiṃ ya eva satasaṃpannaḥ sa eva pratibudhyata uta sa vānyo veti cintyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:804: kutaḥ - yadā hi jalarāśau kaścijjalabinduḥ prakṣipyate jalarāśireva sa tadā bhavati punaruddharaṇe ca sa eva jalabindurbhavatīti duḥsaṃpādam
GSP33brssbh3u:805: tadvatsuptaḥ pareṇaikatmāpannaḥ saṃprasīdatatīti na sa eva punarutthātumarhati /
GSP33brssbh3u:806: tasmātsa eveśvaro vānyo vā jīvaḥ pratibudhyata ityevaṃ prāpta idamāha - sa eva tu jīvaḥ luptaḥ svāsthyaṃ gataḥ punaruttiṣṭhati nānyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:814: tasmādeka eva pūrvedyuraparedyuścaikasya karmaṇaḥ karteti gamyate /

GSP33brssbh3u:820: 'sarvāḥ prajā aharahargacchantya etaṃ brahmalokaṃ na vindanti' (chā. 8.3.2)
GSP33brssbh3u:821: 'ta iha vyāghro vā siṃho vā vṛko vā varāho vā kīṭo vā pataṅgo vā daṃśo vā maśako vā yadyadbhavanti tadābhavanti'
GSP33brssbh3u:822: (chā. 6.9.3) ityevamādayaḥ śabdāḥ svāpaprabodhādhikāre paṭhitā nātmāntarotthāne sāmañjasyamīyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:826: evaṃ cetsyādvada kiṃ kālāntaraphalena karmaṇā vidyayā vā kṛtaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:827: apicānyotthānapakṣe yadi tāvaccharīrāntare vyavaharaṇamāṇo jīva uttiṣṭhettatratyavyavahāralopaprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:829: yohi yasmiñśarīre suptaḥ sa tasminnotiṣṭhatyanyasmiñśarīre supto 'nyasminnuttiṣṭhatīti ko 'syāṃ kalpanāyāṃ lābhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:836: yatpunaruktaṃ yathā jalarāśau prakṣipto jalabindurnoddhartuṃ śakyata evaṃ sati saṃpanno jīvo notpatpatitumarhatīti,
GSP33brssbh3u:839: iha tu vidyate vivekakāraṇaṃ karma cāvidyā ceti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:840: dṛśyate ca durvivecayorapyasmajjātīyaiḥ kṣīrodakayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭayorhaṃsena vivecanam /
GSP33brssbh3u:841: apica na jīvo nāma kaścitparasmādanyo vidyate yo jalabinduriva jalarāśeḥ sato vivicyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:845: sa evāyamupādhiḥ svāpaprabodhayorbījāṅ kuranyāyenetyataḥ sa eva jīvaḥ pratibudhyata iti yuktam // 9 //
GSP33brssbh3u:848: asti mugdho nāma yaṃ mūrchita iti laukikāḥ kathayanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:850: tisrastāvadavasthāḥ śarīrasthasya jīvasya prasiddhā jāgaritaṃ svapnaḥ suṣuptiriti /
GSP33brssbh3u:852: natu pañcamīkācidavasthā jīvasya śrutau smṛtau vā prasiddhāsti /
GSP33brssbh3u:853: tasmāccatasṛṇāmevāvasthānāmanyatamāvasthā mūrchetyevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ- na tāvanmugdho jāgaritāvastho bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh3u:857: yatheṣukāro jāgradapīṣvāsaktamanastayā nānyānviṣayānīkṣata evaṃ mugdho musalasaṃpātādijanitaduḥkhānubhavavyagramanastayā jāgradapi nānyānviṣayānīkṣata iti / na /
GSP33brssbh3u:860: mugdhastu labdhasaṃjño bravītyandhe tamasyahametāvantaṃ kālaṃ prakṣipto 'bhūvaṃ na kiñcinmayā cetitamiti /

GSP33brssbh3u:866: yadi prāṇoṣmaṇorastitvaṃ nāvagacchanti tato mṛto 'yamityadhyavasāya dahanāyāraṇyaṃ nayanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:867: atha tu prāṇamūṣmāṇaṃ vā pratipadyante tato nāyaṃ mṛta ityadhyavasāya saṃjñālābhāya bhiṣajyanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:872: mugdhaḥ kadācicciramapi nocchvasiti savepathurasya deho bhavati bhayānakaṃ ca vadanaṃ visphārite netre /

GSP33brssbh3u:875: pāṇipeṣaṇamātreṇa ca suṣuptamutthāpayanti natu mugdhaṃ mudgaraghātenāpi /
GSP33brssbh3u:883: yāvatā suptaṃ prati tāvaduktaṃ śrutyā - 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati' (chā. 6.8.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:885: 'naitaṃ setumahorātre tarato na jarā na mṛtyurna śoko na sukṛtaṃ na dṛṣkṛtam' (chā. 8.4.1) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:886: jīve hi sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ prāptiḥ sukhitvaduḥkhitvapratyayotpādanena bhavati /

GSP33brssbh3u:890: atrocyate - na brūmo mugdher'dhasaṃpattirjīvasya brahmaṇā bhavatīti /

GSP33brssbh3u:894: yadāsya sāvaśeṣaṃ karma bhavati tadā vāṅmanase pratyāgacchataḥ /

GSP33brssbh3u:903: na sthānato 'pi parasyobhayaliṅgaṃ sarvatra hi / BBs_3,2.11 /

GSP33brssbh3u:905: santyubhayaliṅgāḥ śrutayo brahmaviṣayāḥ 'sarvakarmā sarvakāmaḥ sarvagandhaḥ sarvarasaḥ' (chā. 3.14.2)

GSP33brssbh3u:912: nahyekaṃ vastu svata eva rūpādiviśeṣopetaṃ tadviparītaṃ cetyādhārayituṃ śakyaṃ virodhāt /

GSP33brssbh3u:933: anyathā hi nirviṣayameva bhedaśāstraṃ prasajyeteti cet /
GSP33brssbh3u:937: pratyupādhibhedaṃ hyabhedameva brahmaṇaḥ śrāvayati śāstram - 'yaścāyamasyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ
GSP33brssbh3u:940: ataśca na bhinnākārayogo brahmaṇaḥ śāstrīya iti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33brssbh3u:943: apicaivaṃ bhedadarsananindāpūrvakamabhedadarśanamevaike śākhinaḥ samāmananti - 'manasaivedamāptavyaṃ neha nānāsti kiñcana /
GSP33brssbh3u:944: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyupamāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' (ka. 4.11) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:945: tathānyepi 'bhoktā bhogyaṃ preritāraṃ ca matvā sarvaṃ trividhaṃ brahma me tat' (śve. 1.12)
GSP33brssbh3u:947: kathaṃ punarākāravadupadeśinīṣvanākāropadeśinīṣu ca brahmaviṣayāsu śrutiṣu satīṣvanākārameva brahmāvadhāryate na punarviparītamti /
GSP33brssbh3u:955: mukti. 2.72) 'ākāśo vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā te yadantarā tadbrahma' (chā. 8.14.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:958: ityevamādīni vākyāni niṣprapañcabrahmātmatattvapradhānāni narthāntarapradhānānītyetatpratiṣṭhāpitaṃ 'tattu samanvayāt' (bra.sū. 1.1.4) ityatra
GSP33brssbh3u:961: upāsanāvidhipradhānāni hi tāni teṣvasati virodhe yathāśrutamāśrayitavyam /

GSP33brssbh3u:970: nahi vedavākyānāṃ kasyacidarthavattvaṃ kasyacidanarthavattvamiti yuktaṃ pratipattuṃ pramāṇatvāviśeṣāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:975: satyāmeva ca naisargikyāmavidyāyāṃ lokavedavyavahārāvatāra iti tatra tatrāvocāma // 15 //
GSP33brssbh3u:977: āha ca śrutiścaitanyamātraṃ vilakṣaṇarūpāntararahitaṃ nirviśeṣaṃ brahma - 'sa yathā
GSP33brssbh3u:978: saindhavaghano 'ntaro 'bāhyaḥ kṛtsno rasaghana evaivaṃ vā are 'yamātmānantaro 'bāhyaḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:980: etaduktaṃ bhavati - nāsyātmano 'ntarbahirvā caitanyādanyadrūpamasti lavaṇarasa eva nirantaro bhavati na rasāntaraṃ tathaiveti // 16 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh3u:983: darśayati ca śrutiḥ pararūpapratiṣedhenaiva brahma nirviśeṣatvāt- 'athāta ādeśo neti neti' (bṛ. 2.3.6)
GSP33brssbh3u:987: bāṣkalinā ca bādhvaḥpṛṣṭaḥ sannavacanenaiva brahma provāceti śrūyate - 'sa hovācādhīhi
GSP33brssbh3u:988: bho iti sa tūṣṇīṃ babhūva taṃ ha dvitīye vā tṛtīye vā vacana uvāca brūmaḥ khalu tvaṃ tu na vijānāsi /
GSP33brssbh3u:993: tathā viśvarūpadharo nārāyaṇo nāradamuvāceti smaryate - 'māyā hyeṣā mayā sṛṣṭā yanmāṃ paśyasi nārada /
GSP33brssbh3u:998: yata eva cāyamātmā caitanyarūpo nirviśeṣo vāṅmanasātītaḥ parapratiṣedhopadeśyo 'ta
GSP33brssbh3u:1000: mokṣaśāstreṣu - 'yathā hyajaṃ jyotirātmā vivasvānapo bhinnā bahudhaiko 'nugacchan /
GSP33brssbh3u:1001: upādhinā kriyate bhedarūpo devaḥ kṣetreṣvevamajoyamātmā' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1002: 'eka eva hi bhūtātmā bhūte bhūte vyavasthitaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1008: sūryādibhyo hi mūrtebhyaḥ pṛthagbhūtaṃ viprakṛṣṭadeśaṃ mūrtaṃ gṛhyate tatra yuktaḥ sūryādipratibimbodayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1014: nahi dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭrāntikayoḥ kvacitkañcidvivakṣitāṃśaṃ mukattvā sarvasārūpyaṃ kenaciddarśayituṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1020: jalagataṃ hi sūryapratibimbaṃ jalavṛddhau vardhate jalahrāse hrasati jalacalane calati
GSP33brssbh3u:1021: jalabhede bhidyata ityevaṃ jaladharmānuyāyi bhavati natu paramārthataḥ sūryasya tathātvamasti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1025: darśayati ca śrutiḥ parasyaiva brahmaṇo dehādiṣūpādhiṣvantaranupraveśam - 'puruścakre dvipadaḥ puruścakre catuśpadaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1026: puraḥ sa pakṣī bhūtvā puraḥ puruṣa āviśat' (bṛ. 2.5.18) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1029: tasmānnirvikalpakaikaliṅgameva brahma nobhayaliṅgaṃ viparītaliṅgaṃ ceti siddham /
GSP33brssbh3u:1031: prathamaṃ tāvat- kiṃ pratyastamitāśeṣaprapañcamekākāraṃ brahmota prapañcavadanekākāropetamiti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1032: dvitīyaṃ tu - sthite pratyastamitaprapañcatve kiṃ sallakṣaṇaṃ brahmota bodhalakṣaṇamutobhayalakṣaṇamiti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1037: naca sallakṣaṇameva bhma na bodhalakṣaṇamiti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP33brssbh3u:1039: kathaṃ vā nirastacaitanyaṃ brahma cetanasya jīvasyātmatvenopadiśyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:1040: nāpi bodhalakṣaṇameva brahma na sallakṣaṇamiti śakyaṃ vaktum astītyevopalabdhavyaḥ (pha. 6.13)
GSP33brssbh3u:1045: sattāvyāvṛttena ca bodhena bodhavyāvṛttayā ca sattayopetaṃ brahma pratijānānasya tadeva pūrvādhikaraṇapratiṣiddhaṃ saprapañcatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:1048: atha sattaiva bodho bodha eva ca sattā nānayoḥ parasparavyāvṛttirastīti yadyucyeta
GSP33brssbh3u:1049: tathāpi kiṃ sallakṣaṇaṃ brahmota bodhalakṣaṇamutobhayalakṣaṇamityevaṃ vikalpo nirālambana eva syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:1051: apica brahmaviṣayāsu śrutiṣvākāravadanākārapratipādanena vipratipannasvānākāre brahmaṇi parigṛhīte 'vaśyaṃ vaktavyetarāsāṃ śrutīnāṃ gatiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1053: yadyapyāhurākāravādinyo 'pi śrutayaḥ prapañcapravilayamukhenānākārapratipattyarthā eva na pṛthagarthā iti tadapi na samīcīnamiva lakṣyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1055: ye hi paravidyādhikāre kecitprapañcā ucyante yathā - 'yuktā hyasya harayaḥ śatā deśetyaya vai harayo 'yaṃ vai sahasrāṇi bahūni cānantāni ca' (bṛ. 2.5.19)
GSP33brssbh3u:1058: ye punarupāsanādhikāre prapañcā ucyante yathā 'manomayaḥ prāṇasīro bhārūpaḥ' (chā. 3.14.2)
GSP33brssbh3u:1062: śrutyā caivañjātīyakānāṃ guṇānāmupāsanārthatve 'vakalpyamāne na lakṣaṇayā pravilayārtatvamavakalpate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1063: sarveṣāṃ ca sādhāraṇe pravilayārthatve sati 'arūpavadeva hi tatpradhānatvāt' (bra. sū. 3.2.14)
GSP33brssbh3u:1066: evetyataḥ pārthagartyamevopāsanāvākyānāṃ brahmavākyānāṃ ca nyāyyaṃ naikavākyatvam /
GSP33brssbh3u:1070: vastumātraparyavasāyīni hi brakahmavākyāni na niyogopadeśīnītyetadvistare pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ 'tattu samanvayāt (bra. sū. 1.1.4) ityatra /
GSP33brssbh3u:1072: puruṣo hi niyujyamānaḥ kurviti svavyāpāre kasmiṃścinniyujyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1074: apravilāpite hi dvaitaprapañce brahmatattvāvabodho na bhavatyato brahmatattvāvabodhapratyanīkabhūto dvaitaprapañcaḥ pravilāpyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1075: yathā svargāmasya yāgo 'nuṣṭhātavya upadiśyata evamapavargakāmasya prapañcapravilayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1076: yathāca tamasi vyavasthitaṃ ghaṭāditattvamavabubhutsamānena tatpratyanīkabhūtaṃ tamaḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:1077: pravilāpyata evaṃ brahmatattavamavabubhutsamānena tatpratyanīkabhūtaḥ prapañcaḥ pravilāpayitavyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1078: brahmasvabhāvo hi prapañco na prapañcasvabhāvaṃ brahma,
GSP33brssbh3u:1080: atra vayaṃ pṛcchāmaḥ - ko 'yaṃ prapañcapravilayo nāma /
GSP33brssbh3u:1082: timirakṛtānekacandraprapañcavadavidyākṛto brahmaṇi nāmarūpaprapañco vidyayā pravilāpitavya iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1083: tatra tāvadvidyāmano 'yaṃ prapañco dehādilakṣaṇa ādhyatmiko bāhyaśca pṛthivyādilakṣaṇaḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:1084: pravilāpayitavya ityucyeta sa puruṣamātreṇāśakyaḥ pravilāpayitumiti tatpravilayopadeśo
GSP33brssbh3u:1086: ekena cādimuktena pṛthivyādipravilayaḥ kṛta itīdānīṃ pṛthivyādiśūnyaṃ jagadabhaviṣyat /
GSP33brssbh3u:1087: athāvidyādhyasto brahmaṇyekasminnayaṃ prapañco vidyayā pravilāpyata iti brūyāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:1090: iti tasminnāvedite vidyā svayamevotpadyate tayā cāvidyā bādhyate.
GSP33brssbh3u:1092: anāvedite tu brahmaṇi brahmavijñānaṃ kuru prapañcapravilayaṃ ceti śatakṛtvo 'pyukte,
GSP33brssbh3u:1094: nanvāvedite brahmaṇi tadvijñānaviṣayaḥ prapañcavilayaviṣayo vā niyogaḥ syāt / na /
GSP33brssbh3u:1098: niyojyoñapi ca prapañcāvasthāyāṃ yo 'vagamyate jīvo nāma sa prapañcasyaiva vā syādbrahmapakṣasyaiva vā /
GSP33brssbh3u:1099: prathame vikalpe niṣprapañcabrahmatattvapratipādanena pṛthivyādivajjīvasyāpi pravilāpitatvātkasya prapañcavilaye niyoga ucyeta kasya vā niyoganiṣṭhatayā mokṣo 'vāptavya ucyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:1100: dvitīye 'pi brahmaivāniyojyasvabhāvaṃ jīvasya svarūpaṃ jīvatvaṃ tvavidyākṛtameveti pratipādite brahmaṇi niyojyābhāvānniyogābhāva eva /
GSP33brssbh3u:1102: loke 'pīdaṃ paśyedamākārṇayeti caivañjātīyakeṣu nirdeśeṣu praṇidhānamātraṃ kurvityucyate na sākṣājjñānameva kurviti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1103: jñeyābhimukhasyāpi jñānaṃ kadācijjāyate kadācinna jāyate tasmāttaṃ prati jñānaviṣaya eva darśayitavyo jñāpayitukāmena /
GSP33brssbh3u:1104: tasmindarśite svayameva yathāviṣayaṃ yathāpramāṇaṃ ca jñānamutpadyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1106: yadi punarniyukto 'hamityanyathā jñānaṃ kuryānna tu tajjñānaṃ kiṃ tarhi mānasī sā kriyā /
GSP33brssbh3u:1108: jñānaṃ tu pramāṇajanyaṃ yathābhūtaviṣayaṃ ca na tanniyogaśatenāpi kārayituṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1113: kiñcānyanniyoganiṣṭhatayaiva paryavasyāmnāye yadabhyupagatamaniyojyabrahmātmatvaṃ jīvasya tadapramāṇakameva syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:1114: atha śāstramevāniyojyabrahmātmatvamapyācakṣīta tadavabodhe ca puruṣaṃ niyuñjīta tato brahmaśāstrasyaikasya dvyarthaparatā viruddhārthaparatā ca prasajyetām /
GSP33brssbh3u:1115: niyogaparatāyāṃ ca śrutahāniraśrutakalpanā karmaphalavanmokṣasyādṛṣṭaphalatvamanityatvaṃ cetyevamādayo doṣā na kenacitparihartuṃ śakyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1118: abhyupagamyamāne 'pi ca brahmavākyechu niyogasadbhāve tadekatvaṃ niṣprapañcopadeśeṣu saprapañcopajadeśeṣu cāsiddham /
GSP33brssbh3u:1119: nahi śabdāntarādibhiḥ pramāṇairniyogabhede 'vagamyamāne sarvatraikā niyoga iti śakyamāśrayitum /
GSP33brssbh3u:1125: nahi kṛtsnaprapañcapravilāpanaṃ prapañcaikadeśāpekṣaṇaṃ caikasmindharmiṇi yuktaṃ samāveśayitum /
GSP33brssbh3u:1126: tasmādasmādukta eva vibhāga ākāravadanākāropadeśānāṃ yuktatara iti // 21 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh3u:1127: FN: asya jīvabhāvaṃ prāptasyeśvarasya daśa harayo viṣayā indriyāṇi vā /
GSP33brssbh3u:1131: prakṛtaitāvattvaṃ hi pratiṣedhati tato bravīti ca bhūyaḥ / BBs_3,2.22 /
GSP33brssbh3u:1132: 'dve vāva brahmaṇo rūpe mūrtaṃ caivāmūrtaṃ ca' (bṛ. 2.3.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:1133: ityupakramya pañcamahābhūtāni dvairāśyena pravibhajyāmabartarasasya ca puruṣaśabdoditasya
GSP33brssbh3u:1134: mahārajanādīni rūpāṇi darśayitvā punaḥ paṭhyate - 'athāta ādeśo neti neti nahyetasmāditi
GSP33brssbh3u:1138: itiśabdena tvatra pratiṣedhyaṃ kimapi samarthyate neti netītiparatvānnañprayogasya /
GSP33brssbh3u:1139: itiśabdāśrayaṃ saṃnihitālaṃbana evaṃśabdasamānavṛttiḥ prayujyamāno dṛśyate iti ha smopādhyāyaḥ kathayati ityevamādiṣu /
GSP33brssbh3u:1140: saṃnihitaṃ cātra prakaraṇasāmarthyādrūpadvayaṃ saprapañcaṃ brahmaṇastacca brahmayasyaite dve rūpe /
GSP33brssbh3u:1141: tatra naḥ saṃśaya upajāyate - kimayaṃ pratiṣedho rūpe rūpāvaccobhayamapi pratiṣedhatyāhosvidekataram /
GSP33brssbh3u:1142: yadāpyekataraṃ tadāpi kiṃ brahma pratiṣedhati rūpe pariśiṣṭyāhosvidrūpe pratiṣedhati brahma pariśinaṣṭīti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1145: tayorekena saprapañcaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ pratiṣidhyate 'pareṇa rūpavadbrahmeti bhavati matiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1146: athavā brahmaiva rūpavatpratiṣidhyate taddhi vāṅmanasātītatvādasaṃbhāvyamānasadbhāvaṃ pratiṣedhārham /
GSP33brssbh3u:1151: kiñciddhi paramārthamālambyārthaḥ pratiṣidhyate yathā rajjvādiṣu sarpādayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1154: apariśiṣyamāṇe cānyasminya itaraḥ pratiṣeddhumārabhyate pratiṣeddhumaśakyatvāttasyaiva paramārthatvāpatteḥ pratiṣedhānupapattiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1167: prakṣālanāddhi paṅ kasya dūrādasparśaṃ varam iti hi nyāyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1170: etaduktaṃ bhavati - vāṅmanasātītamaviṣayāntaḥpāti pratyagātmabhūtaṃ nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvaṃ brahmeti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1173: prakṛtaṃ yadetāvadiyattāparicchinnaṃ mūrtāmūrtalakṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ tadeṣa śabdaḥ pratiṣedhati /
GSP33brssbh3u:1174: taddhi prakṛtaṃ prapañcitaṃ ca pūrvasminagranthe 'dhidaivatamadhyātmaṃ ca tajjanitameva
GSP33brssbh3u:1178: tadetatsaprapañcaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ saṃnihitālambanenetikaraṇena pratiṣedhakaṃ nañaṃ pratyupanīyata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1179: brahma tu rūpaviśeṣaṇatvena ṣaṣṭhyā nirdiṣṭaṃ pūrvasmingranthe na svapradhānatvena /
GSP33brssbh3u:1180: prapañcite ca tadīye rūpadvaye rūpavataḥ svarūpajijñāsāyāmidamupakrāntam 'athāta ādeśo neti neti'' (bṛ. 2.3.6) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1182: tadāspadaṃ hīdaṃ samastaṃ kāryaṃ neti netīti pratiṣiddham /
GSP33brssbh3u:1183: yuktaṃ ca kāryasya vācārambhaṇasabdhādibhyo 'sattvamiti neti netīti pratiṣedhanaṃ na tu brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1185: nacātreyamāśaṅkā kartavyā - kathaṃ hi śāstraṃ svayameva rūpadvayaṃ darśayitvā svayameva punaḥ pratiṣedhati - 'prakṣālanāddhi paṅ kasya dūrādasparśanaṃ varam' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1186: yato nedaṃ śāstraṃ pratipādyatvena brahmaṇo rūpadvayaṃ nirdiśati,
GSP33brssbh3u:1187: lokaprasiddhaṃ tvidaṃ rūpadvayaṃ brahmaṇi kalpitaṃ parāmṛśati pratiṣedhyatvāya śuddhabrahmasvarūpapratipādanāya ceti niravadyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:1188: dvau caitau pratiṣedhau yathāsaṃkhyanyāyena dve api mūrtāmūrte pratiṣedhataḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1189: yadvā pūrvaḥ pratiṣedho bhūtarāśiṃ pratiṣedhatyuttaro vāsanārāśim /
GSP33brssbh3u:1191: iti vīpseyamitīti yāvatkiñcidutprekṣyate tatsarvaṃ na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1192: parigaṇitapratiṣedhe hi kriyamāṇe yadi naitadbrahma kimanyadbrahma bhavediti jijñāsā syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:1193: vāpsāyāṃ tu satyāṃ samastasya viṣayajātasya pratiṣedhādaviṣayaḥ pratyagātmā brahmeti jijñāsā nivartate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1194: tasmātprapañcameva brahmaṇi kalpitaṃ pratiṣedhati pariśnaṣṭi brahmeti nirṇayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1197: abhāvāvāsane hi pratiṣedhe kriyamāṇe kimanyatparamastīti brūyāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:1198: tatraiṣākṣarayojanā - neti netīti brahmādiśya tamevādeśaṃ punarnirvakti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1200: nahyetasmādbrahmaṇo vyatiriktamastītyato neti netītyucyate na punaḥ svayameva nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1202: yadā punarevamakṣarāṇi yojyante nahyetasmāditi neti neti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1204: tadā tato bravīti ca bhūya ityetannāmadheyaviṣayaṃ yojayitavyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:1205: atha nāmadheyam - 'satyasya satyamiti prāṇa vai satyaṃ teṣāmeṣa satyam' (bṛ. 2.1.20)
GSP33brssbh3u:1208: abhāvāvasāne tu pratiṣedhe kiṃ satyasya satyamityucyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:1214: yatpratiṣiddhātprapañcajātādanyatparaṃ brahma tadasti cetkasmānna gṛhyata iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1216: āha hyevaṃ śrutiḥ 'na cakṣuṣā gṛhyate nāpi vācā nānyairdevaistapasā karmaṇā vā' (muṇḍa. 3.1.8)
GSP33brssbh3u:1226: tathāhi śrutiḥ - 'parāñci khāni vyatṛṇatsvayaṃ bhūtasmātparāṅpaśyati nāntarātman /
GSP33brssbh3u:1232: yoginastaṃ prapaśyanti bhagavantaṃ sanātanam' iti caivamādyā // 24 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh3u:1233: FN: svayaṃbhūrīśvaraḥ khānīndriyāṇi parāñci anātmagrāhakāṇi kṛtvā vyatṛmat nāsitavān /
GSP33brssbh3u:1246: ataśca svābhāvikatvādabhedasyāvidyākṛtatvācca bhedasya vidyayāvidyāṃ vidhūya jīvaḥ pareṇānantena prājñenātmanekatāṃ gacchati /
GSP33brssbh3u:1247: tathāhi liṅgam - 'sa yo ha vai tatparamaṃ brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati' (mu. 3.2.9)
GSP33brssbh3u:1251: kvacijjīvaprājñayorbhedo vyapadiśyate 'tatastu taṃ paśyate niṣkalaṃ dhyāyamānaḥ' (muṇḍa. 3.1.8)
GSP33brssbh3u:1259: tatraivamubhayavyapadeśe sati yadyabheda evaikāntato gṛhyate bhedavyapadeśo nirālambana eva syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:1264: yathā prakāśaḥ savitrastadāśrayaśca savitā nātyantabhinnāvubhayorapi tejastvāviśeṣāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:1269: yadi punaḥ paramārthata eva baddhaḥ kaścidātmāhikuṇḍalanyāyena parasyātmanaḥ saṃsthānabhūtaḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:1273: abhedameva hi pratipādyatvena nirdiśati bhedaṃ tu pūrvaprasiddhamevānuvadatyarthāntaravivakṣayā /
GSP33brssbh3u:1277: yatkāraṇaṃ parasmādātmano 'nyaṃ cetanaṃ pratiṣedhati śāstram - 'nānyo 'to 'sti draṣṭā' (bṛ. 3.7.23)
GSP33brssbh3u:1281: iti ca brahmavyatiriktaprapañcanirākaraṇādbrahmamātrapariśeṣāccaiva eva siddhānta iti gamyate // 30 //
GSP33brssbh3u:1284: yadetannirastasamastaprapañcaṃ brahma nirdharitamasmātparamanyattattvamasti nāstīti śrutivipratipatteḥ saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1285: kāniciddhi vākyānyāpātenaiva pratibhāsamānāni brahmaṇo 'pi paramanyattattvaṃ pratipādayantīva /
GSP33brssbh3u:1291: setuśabdaśca hi loke jalasaṃtānavicchedakare mṛddārvādipracaye prasiddhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1292: iha tu setuśabda ātmani prayukta iti laukikasetorivātmasetoranyasya vastuno 'stitvaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:1295: yathā laukikaṃ setuṃ tīrtvā jāṅgalamasetuṃ prāpnotyevamātmānaṃ setuṃ tīrtvānātmānamasetuṃ prāpnotīti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1297: yacca loke unmitametāvadidamiti pariccinnaṃ kārṣāpaṇādi tato 'nyadvastvastīti prasiddham /
GSP33brssbh3u:1299: tathā saṃbandhavyapadeśo 'pi bhavati - 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno bhavati' (chā. 6.8.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:1302: mitānāṃ ca mitena saṃndho dṛṣṭo yathā narāṇāṃ nagareṇa /
GSP33brssbh3u:1303: jīvānāṃ ca brahmaṇā saṃbandhaṃ vyapadiśati suṣuptau /
GSP33brssbh3u:1306: tathāhi - 'atha ya eṣo 'ntarāditye hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣo dṛśyate' (chā.
GSP33brssbh3u:1307: 1.6.6) ityādityādhāramīśvaraṃ vyapadiśyatato bhedenākṣyādhāramīśvaraṃ vyapadiśati - 'atha ya eṣo 'ntikṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate' (chā. 1.7.5) iti
GSP33brssbh3u:1308: atideśaṃ cāsyāmunā rūpādiṣu karoti - 'tasyaitasya tadeva rūpaṃ yadamuṣya rūpaṃ yāvamuṣya geṣṇau yannāma tannāma' (chā. 1.7.5)
GSP33brssbh3u:1310: sāvadhikaṃ ceśvaratvamubhayorvyapadiśati - 'ye cāmuṣmātparāñco lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe devakāmānāṃ ca' (chā. 1.6.8) ityekasya /
GSP33brssbh3u:1311: 'ye caitasmādarvāñco lokāsteṣāṃ ceṣṭe manuṣyakāmānāṃ ca' (chā. 1.7.6) ityekasya /
GSP33brssbh3u:1314: evametebhyaḥ setvādivyapadeśebhyo brahmaṇaḥ paramastītyevaṃ prāpte pratipādyate -
GSP33brssbh3u:1319: sarvasya hi janimato vastujātasya janmādi brahmaṇo bhavatīti nirdhāritam /
GSP33brssbh3u:1321: 'naca brahmavyatiriktaṃ kiñcidajaṃ saṃbhavati sadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyam' (chā. 6.2.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:1326: setuvyapadeśastāvanna brahmaṇo bāhyasya sadbhāvaṃ pratipādayituṃ kṣamate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1328: tatra parasminnasati setutvaṃ nāvakalpata iti paraṃ kimapi kalpyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:1331: setusāmānyāttu setuśabda ātmani prayukta iti ś liṣyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1333: ataḥ seturiva seturiti prakṛta ātmā stūyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1335: yathā vyākaraṇaṃ tīrṇa iti prāpta idamucyate nātikrāntastadvat // 32 //
GSP33brssbh3u:1341: catuṣpādaṣṭāśaphaṃ ṣoḍaśakalamityevaṃrūpā buddhiḥ kataṃ nu nāma brahmaṇi sthirā syāditi vikāradvāreṇa brahmaṇa unmānakalpanaiva kriyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1342: nahyavikāre 'nante brahmaṇi sarvaiḥ puṃbhiḥ śakyā bujaddhiḥ sthāpayituṃ mandamadhyamottamabuddhitvātpuṃsāmiti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1344: yathā mana ākāśayoradhyātmamadhidaivataṃ ca brahmapratīkayorāmnātayoścatvāro vāgādayo manaḥsaṃbandhinaḥ pādāḥ kalpyante catvāraścāgnyādaya ākāśasaṃbandhinaḥ ādhyānāya tadvat /
GSP33brssbh3u:1345: athavā pādavaditi yathā kārṣāpaṇe pādavibhāgo vyavahāraprācuryāya kalpyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1346: nahi sakalenaiva kārṣāpaṇena sarvadā sarve janā vyavahartumīśate krayavikraye parimāṇāniyamāttadvadityarthaḥ // 33 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh3u:1347: FN: brahmaṇa unmānakalpanaṃ mandadhiyāṃ dhyānavyavahārāya kārṣāpamasya pādavyavahārāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:1349: iha sūtre dvayorapi saṃbandhabhedavyadeśayoḥ parihāro vidīyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1353: buddyādyupādhisthānaviśeṣayogādudbhūtasya viśeṣavijñānasyopādyupaśame ya upaśamaḥ sa paramātmanā samabandha ityupādhyapekṣayaivopacaryate na parimititvāpekṣayā /
GSP33brssbh3u:1354: tathā bhedavyapadeśo 'pi brahmaṇa upādhibhedāpekṣayopacaryate na svarūpabhedāpekṣayā prakāśādivadityupamopādānāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:1355: yathaikasya prakāśasya sauryasya cāndramasasya vopādhiyogādupajātaviśeṣasyopādhyupaśamātsaṃbandhavyapadeśo bhavatyupādhibhedācca bhedavyapadeśaḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:1358: upapadyate cātredṛśa eva saṃbandho nānyādṛśaḥ 'svamapīto bhavati' (chā. 6.8.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:1365: tathāca śrutirekasyāpyākāśasya stānakṛtaṃ bhedavyapadeśamupapādayati - 'yo 'yaṃ bahirdhā puruṣādākāśaḥ' (chā. 3.12.8)
GSP33brssbh3u:1369: tathānyapratiṣedhāpi na brahmaṇaḥ paraṃ vastvantaramastīti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1378: ityevamādivākyāni svaprakaraṇastānyanyārthatvena pariṇetumaśakyāni brahmavyatiriktaṃ vastvantaraṃ vārayanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1383: setvādivyapadeśeṣu hi mukhyeṣvaṅgīkriyamāṇeṣu pariccheda ātmanaḥ prasajyeta setvādīnāmevātmakatvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:1384: tathānyapratiṣedhe 'pyasati vastu vastvantarādvyāvartata iti pariccheda evātmanaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:1393: yadtadiṣṭāniṣṭavyāmiśralakṣaṇaṃ karmaphalaṃ saṃsāragocaraṃ trividhaṃ prasiddhaṃ jantūnāṃ kimetatkarmaṇo bhavatyāhosvidīśvarāditi bhavati vicāraṇā
GSP33brssbh3u:1396: sa hi sarvādhyakṣaḥ sṛṣṭisthitisaṃhārānvicitrānvidadhaddeśakālaviśeṣābhijñatvātkarmiṇāṃ karmānurūpaṃ phalaṃ saṃpādayatītyupapadyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1400: karma vinaśyatsvakālameva svānurūpaṃ phalaṃ janayitvā vinaśyati tatphalaṃ kālāntaritaṃ kartrā bhokṣyata iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1402: yatkālaṃ hi yatsukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vātmanā bhujyate tasyaiva loke phalatvaṃ prasiddham /
GSP33brssbh3u:1403: nahyasaṃbaddhasyātmanā sukhasya duḥkhasya vā phalatvaṃ pratiyanti laukikāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1416: na kevalamupapattereveśvaraṃ phalahetuṃ kalpayāmaḥ kiṃ tarhi śrutatvādapīśvarameva phalahetuṃ manyāmahe /
GSP33brssbh3u:1417: tathāca śrutirbhavati - 'sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmānnādo vasudānaḥ' (bṛ. 4.4.24)
GSP33brssbh3u:1424: śrūyate tāvadayamarthaḥ svargakāmo yajeta ityevamādiṣu vākyeṣu /
GSP33brssbh3u:1425: tatra ca vidhiśruterviṣayabhāvopagamādyāgaḥ svargasyotpādaka iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1426: anyathā hyananuṣṭhātṛko yāga āpadyeta tatrāsyopadeśavaiyarthyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:1427: nanvanukṣaṇavināśinaḥ sarmaṇaḥ phalaṃ nopapadyata iti parityakto 'yaṃ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1430: śrutiścetpramāṇaṃ yathāyaṃ karmaphalasamabandhaḥ śruta upapadyate tathā kalpayitavyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1431: nacānutpādya kimapyapūrvaṃ karma vinaśyatkālāntaritaṃ phalaṃ dātuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1432: ataḥ karmaṇo vā sūkṣmā kāciduttarāvasthā phalasya vā pūrvāvasthāpūrvaṃ nāmāstīti tarkyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1442: darmādharmayorapi hi kārayitṛtveneśvaro heturvyapadiśyate phalasya ca dātṛtvena 'eṣa hyeṣa sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokebhya unninīṣate
GSP33brssbh3u:1443: eṣa u evāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamadho ninīṣate' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1444: smaryate cāyamartho bhagavadgītāsu - 'yo yo yāṃ yāṃ tanuṃ bhaktaḥ śraddhayārcitumicchati /
GSP33brssbh3u:1447: labhate ca tataḥ kāmānmayaiva vihitānhitān' (7.21) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1449: tadeva ceśvarasya phalahetutvaṃ yatsvakarmānurūpāḥ prajāḥ sṛjatīti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1457: idānīṃ tu prativedāntaṃ vijñānāni bhidyante na veti vicāryate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1458: nanu vijñeyaṃ brahma pūrvāparādibhedarahitamekarasaṃ saindhavaghanavadavadhāritaṃ tatra kuto vijñānabhedābhedacintāvatāraḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1459: nahi karmabahutvavadbrahmabahutvamapi vedānteṣu pratipipādayiṣitamiti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP33brssbh3u:1463: yadi punarekasminbrahmaṇi bahūni vijñānāni vedāntāntareṣu pratipipādayiṣitāni teṣāmekamabhrāntaṃ bhrāntānītarāṇītyanāśvāsaprasaṅgo vedānteṣu
GSP33brssbh3u:1470: atra hi karmavadupāsanānāṃ bhedābhedau saṃbhavataḥ karmavadeva copāsanāni dṛṣṭaphalāni cocyante /
GSP33brssbh3u:1476: asti cātra vedāntāntaravihiteṣu vijñāneṣvanyadanyannāma taittirīyakaṃ vājasaneyakaṃ kauthumakaṃ śāṭyāyanakamityevamādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:1477: tathā rūpabhedo 'pi karmabhedasya pratipādakaḥ prasiddho 'vaiśvadevyāmikṣā vājibhyo vājina' mityevamādiṣu /
GSP33brssbh3u:1479: tadyathā - kecicchākhinaḥ pañcāgnividyāyāṃ ṣaṣṭhamaparamagnimāmananyatpare punaḥ pañcaiva paṭhanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1481: tathā dharmaviśeṣo 'pi karmabhedasya pratipādaka āśaṅkitaḥ kārīryādiṣu /
GSP33brssbh3u:1484: evaṃ punaruktyādayo 'pi bhedahetavo yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vedāntāntareṣu yojayitavyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1486: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - sarvavedāntapratyayāni vijñānāni tasmiṃstasminvedānte tāni tānyeva bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1490: yathaikasminnagnihotre śākhābhede 'pi puruṣaprayatnastādṛśa eva codyate juhuyāditi /
GSP33brssbh3u:1491: evam 'yo ha vai jyoṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca veda' (bṛ.6.1.1, chā. 5.1.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:1492: iti vājasaneyināṃ chandogānāṃ ca tādṛśyeva codanā /
GSP33brssbh3u:1493: prayojanasaṃyogo 'pyaviśiṣṭa eva 'jyeṣṭhaśca śreṣṭhaśca svānāṃ bhavati'' (bṛ. 6.1.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1494: rūpamapyubhayatra tadeva vijñānasya yaduta jyeṣṭhaśreṣṭhādiguṇaviśeṣaṇānvitaṃ prāṇatattvam /
GSP33brssbh3u:1495: yathā ca dravyadevate yāgasya rūpamevaṃ vijñeyaṃ rūpaṃ vijñānasya tena hi tadrūpyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1499: ye tu nāmarūpādayo bhedahetvābhāsāste prathama eva kāṇḍe na nāmnā syādacodanābhidhānatvāt ityārabhya parihṛtāḥ // 1 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh3u:1500: FN: codyata iti codanā puruṣaprayatnaḥ sa hi puruṣavyāpāraḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1502: bhedān neti cen naikasyām api / BBs_3,3.2 /
GSP33brssbh3u:1505: tathāhi vājasaneyinaḥ pañcāgnividyāṃ prastutyaḥ ṣṭhamaparamagnimāmananti - 'tasyāgnirevāgnirbhavati' (bṛ. 6.2.14) ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh3u:1506: chandogāstu taṃ nāmananti pañcasaṃkhyayaiva ca ta upasaṃharanti 'atha ha ya etānevaṃ pañcāgnīnveda' (chā. 5.10.10) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1507: yoṣāṃ ca sa guṇo 'sti yeṣāṃ ca nāsti kathamubhayeṣāmekā vidyopapadyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:1510: tathā prāṇasaṃvāde śreṣṭhādanyāṃścaturaḥ prāṇānvākcakṣuḥ śrotamanāṃsi chandogā āmananti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1511: vājasaneyinastu pañcamamapyāmananti 'reto vai prajāpatiḥ prajāyate ha prajayā paśubhirya evaṃ veda' (bṛ. 6.1.6) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1512: āvāpodvāpabhedācca vedyabhedo bhavati vedyabhedācca vidyābhedo dravyadevatābhedādiva yāgasyeti cet /
GSP33brssbh3u:1515: yadyapi ṣaṣṭhasyāgnerupasaṃhāro na saṃbhavati tathāpi dyuprabhṛtīnāṃ pañcānāmagnīnāmubhayatra pratyabhijñāyāmānatvānna vidyābhedo bhavitumarhati
GSP33brssbh3u:1517: paṭhyate 'pi ca ṣaṣṭho 'gniśchandogaiḥ - 'taṃ pretaṃ diṣṭamito 'gnaya evaṃ haranti'
GSP33brssbh3u:1519: vājasaneyinastu sāṃpādikeṣu pañcasvagniṣvanuvṛttāyāḥ samiddhūmādikalpanāyā nivṛttaye 'tasyāgnirevāgnirbhavati samitsamit' (bṛ. 6.2.14)
GSP33brssbh3u:1521: athāpyupāsanārtha eṣa vādastathāpi sa guṇaḥ śakyatechandogairapyupasaṃhartum /
GSP33brssbh3u:1523: sāṃpādikāgnyabhiprāyā hyeṣā pañcasaṃkhyā nityānuvādabhūtā na vidhisamavāyinītyadoṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1528: FN: ito 'smāllokān diṣṭaṃ lokāntaraṃ pretaṃ gataṃ jñātayo 'gnaye harantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1529: svādhyāyasya tathātvena hi samācāre 'dhikārāc ca savavac ca tanniyamaḥ / BBs_3,3.3 /
GSP33brssbh3u:1530: yadapyuktamātharvaṇikānāṃ vidyāṃ prati śirovratādyapekṣaṇādanyeṣāṃ ca tadanapekṣaṇādvadyābheda iti tatpratyucyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1533: yatastathātvena svādyāyadharmatvena samācāre vedavratopadeśapare granta ātharvaṇikā idamapi vedavratatvena vyākyātamiti samāmananti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1535: iti cādikṛtaviṣayādecchabdādadhyayanaśabdācca svopaniṣadadhyayanadharma evaiṣa iti nirdāryate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1536: nanu ca 'teṣāmevaitāṃ brahmavidyāṃ vadeta śirovrataṃ vidhivadyaistu cīrṇam' (muṇḍa. 3.2.10)
GSP33brssbh3u:1537: iti brahmavidyāsaṃyogaśravaṇādekaiva sarvatra brahmavidyeti saṃkīryetaiṣa dharmaḥ / na /
GSP33brssbh3u:1539: praka-tatvaṃ ca brahmavidyāyā granthaviśeṣāpekṣamiti granthaviśeṣasaṃyogyevaiṣa dharmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1545: darśayati ca vedo 'pi vidyaikatvaṃ sarvavedānteṣu vedyaikatvopadeśāt sarve vedā yatparamāmananti (ka. 2.15) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1546: tathā etaṃ hyeva bahvṛcā mahatyukthe mīmāṃsanta etamagnāvadhvarya etaṃ mahāvrate chandogāḥ iti ca /
GSP33brssbh3u:1548: iti kāṭhaka uktasyeśvaraguṇasya bhayahetukasya taittirīyake bhedarśananindāyai parāmarśo dṛśyate 'yadā hyevaiṣa etasminnudaramantaraṃ kurute
GSP33brssbh3u:1551: tathā vājasaneyake prādeśamātrasaṃpāditasya vaiśvānarasya chāndogye siddhavadupādānam 'yastvetamevaṃ prādeśamātramabhivimānamātmānaṃ vaiśvānaramupāste' (chā. 5.18.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1556: sthite caivaṃ sarvavedāntapratyayatve sarvavijñānānāmanyatroditānāṃ vijñānaguṇānāmanyatrāpi samāne vijñāna upasaṃhāro bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:1558: ya eva hi teṣāṃ guṇānāmekatrārtho viśiṣṭavijñānopakārakaḥ sa evānyatrāpi /
GSP33brssbh3u:1562: yadi hi vijñānabhedo bhavettato vijñānāntaranibaddhatvādguṇānāṃ prakṛtivikṛtibhāvābhāvācca na syādupasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1564: asyaiva tu prayojanasūtrasya prapañcaḥ sarvābhedādityārabhya bhaviṣyati // 5 //
GSP33brssbh3u:1566: anyathātvaṃ śabdād iti cen nāviśeṣāt / BBs_3,3.6 /
GSP33brssbh3u:1570: paṭhyate - 'atha hemamāsanyaṃ prāṇamūcustvaṃ na udgāyeti tatheti tebhya eṣa prāṇa
GSP33brssbh3u:1573: iti prakramyetarānprāṇānasurapāpmaviddhatvena ninditvā tathaiva mukhyaprāṇaparigrahaḥ paṭhyate - 'atha ha ya evāyaṃ mukhyaḥ prāṇastamudgīthamupāsāṃcakrire' (chā. 1.2.7) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1578: anyathā hi prakramante vājasaneyino 'nyathā chandogāḥ 'tvaṃ na udgāya' (bṛ. 1.3.2)
GSP33brssbh3u:1588: vājasaneyake 'picodgīthasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ prāṇasya śrutam - 'eṣa u vā udgīthaḥ' (bṛ. 1.3.23) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1594: na vā vidyaikatvamātra nyāyyaṃ vidyābheda evātra nyāyyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1600: ityevamudgīthāvayavasyoṅkārasyopāsyatvaṃ prastutya rasatamādiguṇopavyākhyānaṃ tatra kṛtvā atha khalvetasyaivākṣarasyopavyākhyānaṃ bhavati (chā.
GSP33brssbh3u:1601: iti punarapi tamevodgīthāvayavamoṅkāramanuvartya devāsurākhyāyikādvāreṇa tam prāṇamudgīthamupāsāṃcakrire (chā. 1.2.2) ityāha /
GSP33brssbh3u:1602: tatra yadyudgīthaśabdena sakalā bhaktirabhipreyeta tasyāśca kartodgātartviktata upakramaścoparapadhyeta lakṣaṇā ca psajyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:1607: ityapi tasyāḥ kartodgātartvikprāṇatvena nirūpyata iti prasthānāntaram /
GSP33brssbh3u:1608: yadapi tatrodgīthasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ prāṇasya tadapyudgātṛtvenaiva didarśayiṣitasya prāṇasya sarvātmatvapratipādanārthamiti na vidyaikatvamāvahati
GSP33brssbh3u:1609: sakalabhaktiviṣaya eva ca tatrāpyudgīthaśabda iti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:1612: tathāca tatraiva śrāvitam- vācā ca hyeva sa prāṇena codagāyat (bṛ. 1.3.24) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1614: tathāhyabhyudayavākye paśukāmavākye ca tredhā taṇḍulānvibhajedye madhyamāḥ syustānagnaye
GSP33brssbh3u:1627: saṃjñātaś cet tad uktam asti tu tad api / BBs_3,3.8 /
GSP33brssbh3u:1630: uktaṃ hyetat - 'na vā prakaraṇabhedātparovarīyastvādivat' (bra. sū. 3.3.7) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1631: tadeva cātra nyāyyataraṃ śrutyakṣarānugataṃ hi tatsaṃjñaikatvaṃ tu śrutyakṣarabāhyamudgīthaśabdamātraprayogāllaukikairvyahartṛbhirupacaryate
GSP33brssbh3u:1633: tathā prasiddhabhedānāmapyagnihotradarśapūrṇamāsādīnāṃ kāṭhakaikagranthaparipaṭhitānāṃ kāṭhakasaṃjñakatvaṃ dṛśyate tathehāpi bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssbh3u:1634: yatra tu nāsti kaścidevañjātīyako bhedahetustatra bhavatu saṃjñaikatvādvidyaikatvaṃ yathā saṃvargavidyādiṣu // 8 //
GSP33brssbh3u:1638: ityatrākṣarodgīthaśabdayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇye śrūyamāṇe 'dhyāsāpavādaikatvaviśeṣaṇapakṣāṇāṃ pratibhāsanātkatamo 'tra pakṣo nyāyyaḥ syāditi vicāraḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:1641: yathā nāmni brahmabuddhāvadhyasyamānāyāmapyanuvartata eva nāmabuddhirna brahmabuddhyā nivartate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1644: apavādo nāma yatra kasmiṃścidvastuni pūrvaniviṣṭāyāṃ mithyābuddhau niścitāyāṃ paścādupajāyamānā yathārthā buddhiḥ pūrvaniviṣṭāyā mithyābuddhernivartikā bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:1652: viśeṣaṇaṃ punaḥ sarvavedavyāpina omityetasyākṣarasya grahaṇaprasaṅga audgātraviśeṣasya samarpaṇam /
GSP33brssbh3u:1655: evametasminsāmānādhikaraṇyavākye vimṛśyamāna ete pakṣāḥ pratibhānti tatrānyatamanirdhāraṇakāraṇābhāvādanirdāraṇaprāptāvidamucyate - vyāpteśca samañjasamiti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1657: tadiha kṣayaḥ pakṣāḥ sāvadyā iti paryudasyante /
GSP33brssbh3u:1659: tatrādhyāse tāvadyā buddhiritaratrādhyasyate tacchabdasya lakṣaṇāvṛttitvaṃ prasajyeta tatphalaṃ ca kalpyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:1660: śrūyata eva phalam 'āpayitā ha vai kāmānāṃ bhavati' (chā. 1.1.7)
GSP33brssbh3u:1670: nāpyekatvapakṣaḥ saṃgacchate niṣprayojanaṃ hi tadā śabdadvayoccāraṇaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:1672: naca hautraviṣaya ādhvaryavaviṣaye vākṣara oṅkāraśabdavācya udgīthaśabdaprasiddhirasti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1677: sarvavyāpyakṣaramiha mā prasañjītyata udgīthaśabdenākṣaraṃ viśeṣyate kathaṃ nāmodgīthāvayavabhūta oṅkāro gṛhyeteti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1682: adhyāsapakṣe hyarthāntarabuddhirarthāntare nikṣipyata iti viprakṛṣṭā lakṣaṇā viśeṣaṇapakṣe pravṛttāḥ śabdā avayaveṣvapi pravartamānā dṛṣṭāḥ paṭagrāmādiṣu /
GSP33brssbh3u:1686: vājināṃ chandogānāṃ ca prāṇasaṃvāde śraiṣṭhyaguṇānvitasya prāṇasyopāsyatvamuktam /
GSP33brssbh3u:1687: vāgādayo 'pi hi tatra vasiṣṭhatvādiguṇānvitā uktāḥ te ca prāṇe punaḥ pratyarpitāḥ - 'yadvā ahaṃ vasiṣṭho 'smi tvaṃ tadvasiśṣo 'si' (bṛ. 6.1.14) ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh3u:1688: anyeṣāmapi tu śākhināṃ kauṣītaki prabhṛtīnāṃ prāṇasaṃvādeṣu athāto niḥśreyasādānam 'etā ha vai devatā ahaṃśreyase vivadamānāḥ' (kau. 2.14)
GSP33brssbh3u:1689: ityevañjātīyakeṣu prāṇasya śraiḥṣṭamuktaṃ na tvime vasiṣṭhatvādayo 'pi guṇā uktāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1690: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimime vasiṣṭhatvādayo guṇāḥ kvaciduktā anyatrāpyasyerannuta nāsyeranniti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1693: 'atho ya evaṃ vidvānprāṇe niḥśreyasaṃ viditvā' iti tatratatraivaṃśabdena vedyaṃ vastu nivedyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1694: evaṃśabdaśca saṃnihitāvalambano na śākhāntaraparipaṭhimevañjātīyakaṃ guṇajātaṃ śaknoti nivedayitum /
GSP33brssbh3u:1696: evaṃ prāpte pratyāha - asyetanniyame guṇāḥ kvaciduktā vasiṣṭhatvādayo 'nyatrāpi /
GSP33brssbh3u:1700: abhede ca vijñānasya kathamime guṇāḥ kvaciduktā anyatra nāsyeran /
GSP33brssbh3u:1701: nanvevaṃśabdastatra tatra bhedenaivañjātīyakaṃ guṇajātaṃ vedyatvāya samarpayatītyuktam /
GSP33brssbh3u:1703: tasminneva vijñāne vājasaneyibrāhmaṇagatenaivaṃśabdena tatsaṃśabditamiti na paraśākhāgatamapyabhinnavijñānāvaruddhaṃ
GSP33brssbh3u:1706: ekasyāmapi hi śākhāyāṃ śrutā guṇāḥ śrutā eva sarvatra bhavanti guṇavato bhedābhāvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:1707: nahi devadattaḥ śauryādiguṇatvena svadeśe prasiddho deśāntaraṃ gatastaddeśyairavibhāvitaśauryādiguṇo 'pyatadguṇo bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:1715: brahmasvarūpapratipādanaparāsu śrutiṣvānandarūpatvaṃ vijñānaghanatvaṃ sarvagatatvaṃ sarvātmatvamityevañjātīyakā brahmaṇo dharmāḥ kvacitkecicchrūyante
GSP33brssbh3u:1716: teṣu saṃśayaḥ - kimānandādayo brahmadharmā yatra yāvantaḥ śrūyante tāvanta eva tatra pratipattavyāḥ kiṃvā sarve sarvatreti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1717: tatra yathāśrutivibhāgaṃ dharmapratipattau prāptāyāmidamucyate - ānandādayaḥ pradhānasya brahmaṇo dharmāḥ sarve sarvatra pratipattavyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1720: sarvatra hi tadevaikaṃ pradhānaṃ viśeṣyaṃ brahma na bhidyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1722: nanvevaṃ sati priyaśirastvādayo 'pi dharmāḥ sarvatra saṃkīryeran /
GSP33brssbh3u:1723: tathāhi - taittirīyaka ānandamayamātmānaṃ prakramyāmnāyate - 'tasya priyameva śiraḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1730: priyaśirastvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ taittirīyaka āmnātānāṃ nāstyanyatra prāptiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1731: yatkāraṇaṃ priyaṃ modaḥ pramoda ānanda ityete parasparāpekṣayā bhoktrantarāpekṣayā copacitāpacitarūpā upalabhyante /
GSP33brssbh3u:1737: apica parasminbrahmaṇi cittāvatāropāyamātratvenaite parikalpyante na draṣṭavyatvena /
GSP33brssbh3u:1740: sa ca nyāyo 'nyeṣu niściteṣu brahmadharmeṣūpāsanāyopadiśyamāneṣu netavyaḥ saṃyadvāmādiṣu satyakāmādiṣu ca /
GSP33brssbh3u:1741: teṣu hi satyapyupāsyasya brahmaṇa ekatme prakramabhedādupāsanābhede sati nānyonyadharmāṇāmanyonyatra prāptiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1742: yathā ca dve nāryāvekaṃ nṛpatimupāsate chatreṇaikā cāmareṇānyā tatropāsyaikatve 'pyupāsanābhedo dharmavyavasthā ca bhavetyevamihāpīti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1743: upacitāpacitaguṇatvaṃ hi sati bhedavyavahāre saguṇe brahmaṇyupapadyate na nirguṇe parasminbrahmaṇi /
GSP33brssbh3u:1744: ato na satyakāmatvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kvacicchrutānāṃ sarvatra prāptirityarthaḥ // 12 //
GSP33brssbh3u:1747: brahmaṇo dharmiṇa ekatvātsarve sarvatra pratīyeranniti vaiṣamyaṃ pratipattimātraprayojanā hi ta iti // 13 //
GSP33brssbh3u:1750: kāṭhake hi paṭhyate - 'indriyebhyaḥ parā hyarthā arthebhyaśca paraṃ manaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1752: ityārabhya 'puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ' (ka. 3.11 ) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1753: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimime sarva evārthādayastatastataḥ paratvena pratipādyanta uta puruṣa evaibhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ paraḥ pratipādyata iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1754: tatra tāvatsarveṣāmevaiṣāṃ paratvena pratipādanamiti bhavati matiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1757: nanu bahuṣvartheṣu paratvena pratipipādayiṣiteṣu vākyabhedaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:1762: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - puruṣa eva hyebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ paraḥ pratipādya iti yuktaṃ na pratyekameṣāṃ paratvapratipādanam /
GSP33brssbh3u:1765: nahītareṣu paratvena pratipanneṣu kiñcitprayojanaṃ dṛśyate prayojanaṃ mokṣasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1767: apica parapratiṣedhena kāṣṭhāśabdena ca puruṣaviṣayamādaraṃ darśayanpuruṣapratipattyarthaiva pūrvāparapravāhoktiriti darśayati - ādhyānāyeti
GSP33brssbh3u:1772: yatkāraṇam 'eṣa sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍhotmā na prakāśate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1776: tasyaiva ca durvijñānatāṃ saṃskṛtamitigamyatāṃ ca darśayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:1780: evamanekaprakāra āśayātiśayaḥ śruteḥ puruṣe lakṣyate netareṣu /
GSP33brssbh3u:1782: ityukte kiṃ tadadhvanaḥ pāraṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padamityasyāmākāṅkṣāyāmindriyādyanukramaṇātparamapadapratipattyartha evāyamāyāma ityavasīyate //
GSP33brssbh3u:1785: aitareyake śrūyate - 'ātmā vā idameka evāgra āsīnnānyatkiñcana miṣatsa īkṣata lokānnu sṛjā' (ai. 1.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:1787: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ para evātmaśabdenābhilapyata utānyaḥ kaściditi /
GSP33brssbh3u:1791: nanu vākyānvayaḥ sutarāṃ paramātmaviṣayo dṛśyate prāgutpatterātmaikatvāvadhāraṇāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:1795: paramātmani hi sraṣṭari parigṛhyamāṇe mahābhūtasṛṣṭirādau vaktavyā lokasṛṣṭistvihādāvucyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1799: smṛtirapi 'sa vai śarīrī prathamaḥsa vai puruṣaḥ ucyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1800: ādikartā sa bhūtānāṃ brahmāgre samavartata' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1801: aitareyiṇo 'pi athāto retasaḥ prajāpate reto devāḥ ityatra pūrvasminprakaraṇe prajāpatikartṛkāṃ vicitrāṃ sṛṣṭimāmananti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1802: ātmaśabdo 'pi tasminprayujyamāno dṛśyate - ātmaivedamagra āsītpuruṣavidhiḥ' (bṛ. 1.4.1) ityatra /
GSP33brssbh3u:1805: apica tābhyo gāmānayattābhyo 'śvamānayattābhyoḥ puruṣamānayattā abruvannityevañjātīyako bhūyānvyāpāraviśeṣo laukikeṣu viśeṣavatsvātmasu prasiddha ihānugamyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1807: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - 'para evātmehātmaśabdena gṛhyata itaravat /
GSP33brssbh3u:1808: yathetareṣu sṛṣṭiśravaṇeṣu tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai. 2.1.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:1810: yathā cetarasmiṃllaukikātmaśabdaprayoge pratyagātmaiva mukhya ātmaśabdena gṛhyate tathehāpi bhavitumarhati yatra tu 'ātmaivedamagra āsīt' (bṛ.
GSP33brssbh3u:1812: ityevamādi viśeṣaṇāntaraṃ śrūyate bhavettatra viśeṣata ātmano grahaṇam /
GSP33brssbh3u:1813: atra punaḥ paramātmagrahaṇānuguṇameva viśeṣaṇamapyuttaramupalabhyate 'sa īkṣata lokānnu sṛjā iti' (ai. 1.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:1824: anvayād iti cet syād avadhāraṇāt / BBs_3,3.17 /
GSP33brssbh3u:1836: śrutyantaraprasiddho hi samānaviṣayo viśeṣaḥ śrutyantareṣūpasaṃhartavyo bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:1837: yo 'pyayaṃ vyāpāraviśeṣānugamastābhyo gāmānayadityevamādiḥ so 'pi vivakṣitārthāvadhāraṇānuguṇyenaiva grahītavyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1838: nahyayaṃ sakalaḥ kathāprabandho vivakṣata iti śakyate vaktuma,
GSP33brssbh3u:1841: tathāhyamabhaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ lokānāṃ lokapālānāṃ cāgnyādīnāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ śiṣṭāvā karaṇāni
GSP33brssbh3u:1842: karaṇāyatanaṃ ca śarīramupadiśya sa eva sraṣṭā 'kathaṃ nvidaṃ madṛte syāt' (ai. 3.11
GSP33brssbh3u:1843: iti vīkṣyedaṃ śarīraṃ praviveśeti darśayati - 'sa etameva sīmānaṃ vidāryaitayā dvārā
GSP33brssbh3u:1847: iti vīkṣya 'sa etameva puruṣaṃ brahma tatamamapaśyat' (ai. 3.13)
GSP33brssbh3u:1850: ityādinā samastabhedajātaṃ saha mahābhūtairamukramya 'sarvaṃ tatprajñānetraṃ prajñāne pratiṣṭhitaṃ prajñānetro lokaḥ prajñā pratiṣṭhā prajñānaṃ brahma' (aita. 5.3)
GSP33brssbh3u:1854: vājasaneyake 'katama ātmeti yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdyantarjyotiḥ puruṣaḥ' (bṛ. 4.3.7)
GSP33brssbh3u:1856: tathāhyupasaṃharati - 'sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmājaro 'maro 'mṛto 'bhayo brahma' (bṛ. 4.4.25) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1860: tatra saṃśayaḥ - tulyārthatvaṃ kimanayorāmnānayoḥ syādatulyārthatvaṃ veti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1875: yaduktamupakramānvayādupakrame cātmaśabdaśravaṇābhāvānnātmagṛhītiriti tasya kaḥ parihāra iti cetso 'bhidhīyate syādavadhāraṇāditi /
GSP33brssbh3u:1881: anyathā hi yo 'yaṃ mikhya ātmā sa na vijñāta iti naiva sarvavijñānaṃ saṃpadyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:1882: tathā prāgutpatterekatvāvadhāraṇaṃ jīvasya cātmaśabdena parāmarśaḥ svāpāvasthāyāṃ ca tatsvabhāvasaṃpattikathanaṃ paricodanāpūrvakaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ 'tattvamasi' (chā. 6.8.7)
GSP33brssbh3u:1886: sāmānyopakramaśca na vākyaśeṣagatena viśeṣeṇa virudhyate viśeṣākāṅkṣitvātsāmānyasya /
GSP33brssbh3u:1887: sacchabdārtho 'pi ca paryālocyamāno na mukhyādātmano 'nyaḥ saṃbhavatyato 'nyasya vastujātasyārambhaṇaśabdādibhyo 'nṛtatvopapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1890: tasmādevañjātīyakeṣu vākyeṣu pratipādanaprakārabhede 'pi pratipādyārthābheda iti siddham // 17 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh3u:1896: chandogā vājasaneyinaśca prāṇasaṃvāde śvādisaṃvāde śvādimaryādaṃ prāṇasyānnamāmnānya tasyaivāpo vāsa āmananti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1897: anantaraṃ ca chandogā āmananti -'tasmādvā etadaśiṣyantaḥ purastāccoṣṭāccādbhiḥ paridadhāti' (chā. 5.2.2) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1898: vājasaneyinastvāmananti - 'tadvidvāṃsaḥ śrotriyā aśiṣyanta ācāmantyaśitvācāmantyetameva tadanamanagnaṃ kurvanto manyante' (bṛ. 6.1.14)
GSP33brssbh3u:1900: tatra tvācamanamanagnatācintanaṃ ta prāṇasya pratīyate tkimubhayamapi vidhīyata utācamanamevotānagnatācintanameveti vicāryate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1906: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - nācamanasya vidheyatvamupapadyate kāryākhyānāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:1911: sāmānyaviṣayā hi smṛtiḥ puruṣamātrasaṃbaddhaṃ prāyatyārthamācamanaṃ prāpayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:1918: tasmātprāptamevāśisiṣatāmaśitavatāṃ cobhayata ācamanamanūdya 'etameva tadanamanagnaṃ kurvanto manyante' (bṛ. 6.1.14)
GSP33brssbh3u:1923: nacaivaṃ satyekasyācamanasyobhayārthatābhyupagatā bhavati prāyatyārthatā paridhānārthā cheti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1924: kriyāntaratvābhyupagamāt kriyāntarameva hyācamanaṃ nāma prāyatyārthaṃ puruṣasyābhyupagamyate,
GSP33brssbh3u:1925: tadīyāsu tvapsu vāsaḥsaṃkalpanaṃ nāma kriyāntarameva paridhānārthaṃ prāṇasyābhyupagamyata ityanavadyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:1926: apica 'yadidaṃ kiñcāśvasya ā kṛmibhya ā kīṭapataṅgebhyastatte 'nnam (bṛ. 6.1.14)
GSP33brssbh3u:1929: sarvaṃ tu prāṇasyānnamitīyamannadṛṣṭiścodyate tatsāhacaryāccāpo vāsa ityatrāpi nāpāmācamanaṃ codyate prasiddhāsvevatvācamanīyāsvapsu paridhānadṛṣciścodyata iti yuktam /
GSP33brssbh3u:1934: avaśyavidheye tvanyatarasminvāsaḥkāryākhyānādapāṃ vāsaḥsaṃkalpanamevāpūrvaṃ vidhīyate nācamanaṃ pūrvavaddhi tadityupapāditam /
GSP33brssbh3u:1935: yadapyuktaṃ vispaṣṭā cācamane vidhivibhaktiriti tadapi pūrvavattvenaivācamanasya pratyuktam /
GSP33brssbh3u:1936: ata evācamanasyāvidhitsitatvādetameva tadanamanagnaṃ kurvanto manyanta ityatraiva kāṇvāḥ paryavasyanti nāmananti tasmādevaṃvidityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:1937: tasmānmādhyandinānāmapi pāṭha ācamanānuvādenaivaṃvittvameva prakṛtaprāṇavāsovittvaṃ vidhīyata iti pratipattavyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:1938: yo 'pyayamabhyupagamaḥ kvacidācamanaṃ vidhīyate kvacidvāsovijñānamiti so 'pi na sādhuḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1939: āpo vāsa ityādikāyā vākyapravṛtteḥ sarvatraikarūpyāt tasmādvāsovijñānameveha vidhīyate nācamanamiti nyāyyam // 18 //
GSP33brssbh3u:1943: tatra ca guṇāḥ śrūyante - sa ātmānamupāsīta manamayaṃ prāṇaśarīraṃ bhārūpam ityevamādayaḥ.
GSP33brssbh3u:1944: tasyāmeva śāstrāyāṃ bṛhadāraṇyake punaḥ paṭhyate - 'manomayo 'yaṃ puruṣo bhāḥ satyasminnantarhadaye
GSP33brssbh3u:1945: yadā vrīhirvā yavo vā sa eṣa sarvasyeśānaḥ sarvasyādhipatiḥ sarvamidaṃ praśāsti yadidaṃ
GSP33brssbh3u:1947: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimiyamekā vidyāgnirahasyabṛhadāraṇyakayorguṇopasaṃhāraścota dve ime vidye guṇānupasaṃhāraśceti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1951: bhinnāsu hi śākhāsvadhyetṛbhedātpaunaruktasyaparihāramālocya vidyaikatvamadhyavasāyaikatrātiriktā guṇā itaratropasaṃhriyante prāṇasaṃvādādiṣvatyuktam
GSP33brssbh3u:1952: ekasyāṃ punaḥ śākhāyāmadhyetṛveditṛbhedābhāvādaśakyaparihāre paunaruktye na viprakṛṣṭadeśasthaikā vidyā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh3u:1954: tadā hyatiriktā eva guṇā itaratretaratra cāmnāyeranna samānā api tūbhayatrāmnāyante manomayatvadayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:1956: evaṃ prāpte brūmahe - yathā bhinnāsu śākhāsu vidyaikatvaṃ guṇopasaṃhāraśca bhavatyevamekasyāmapi śākhāyāṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh3u:1964: ekaṃ hyāmnānaṃ vidyāvidyāvidhānārthamaparaṃ guṇavidhānārthamiti na kiñcinnopapadyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1965: nanvevaṃ sati yadupaṭhimagnirahasye tadeva bṛhadāraṇyake paṭhitavyam sa eṣa sarvasyeśānaḥ ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:1966: yattu paṭhitameva manomaya ityādi cenna paṭhitavyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:1969: masānaguṇāmnānena hi viprakṛṣṭadeśāṃ śāṇḍilyavidyāṃ pratyabhijñāpya tasyāmīśānatvādyupadiśyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:1971: apicāprāptāṃśopadeśenārthavati vākye saṃjāte prāptāṃśaparāmarśasya nityānuvādatayāpyupapadyamānatvānna tadbalena pratyabhijñopodituṃ śakyate
GSP33brssbh3u:1976: ityukramya 'tadyattatsatyamasau sa ādityo ya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣo yaścāyaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣanpuruṣaḥ' (bṛ. 55.2)
GSP33brssbh3u:1977: iti tasyaiva satyasya brahmaṇo 'dhidaivatamadhyātmaṃ cāyatanaviśeṣamupadiśya vyāhṛtiśarīratvaṃ ca saṃpādya dve upaniṣadāvupadiśyete /
GSP33brssbh3u:1980: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimavibhāgenaivobhe apyupaniṣadāvubhayatrānusaṃgātavye uta vibhāgenaikādhidaivamekādhyātmamiti /
GSP33brssbh3u:1982: yathā śāṇḍilyavidyāyāṃ vibhāgenāpyadhītāyāṃ guṇopasaṃhāra ukta evamanyatrāpyevañjātīyake viṣaye bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh3u:1996: kathaṃ sthānaviśeṣopanibandha ityucyate - 'ya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣaḥ' (bṛ. 5.5.3)
GSP33brssbh3u:1997: iti hyādhidaivakaṃ puruṣaṃ prakṛtya tasyopaniṣadahariti śrāvayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2003: nanveka evāyamadhidaivatamadhyātmaṃ ca puruṣa ekasyaiva satyasya brahmaṇa āyatanadvayapratipādanāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2006: asti cāyaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ satyapyācāryasvarūpāpānapāye yadācāryasyāsīnasyanuvartanamuktaṃ na tattiṣṭhato bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2008: grāmāraṇyayostvācāryasvarūpānāpāyāttatsvarūpānubuddhasya ca dharmasya grāmāraṇyakṛtaviśeṣābhāvādubhayatra tulyavadbhāva ityadṛṣṭāntaḥ saḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2011: api caivañjātīyakānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vyavastheti liṅgadarśanaṃ bhavati - 'tasyaitasya tadeva rūpaṃ yāvamuṣya geṣṇau tau geṣṇau yannāma tannāma' (chā. 1.7.5) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2017: brahmajyeṣṭhā viryā saṃbhṛtāni brahmāgre jyeṣṭhaṃ divamātatāna ityevaṃ rāṇāyanīyānāṃ khileṣu vīryasaṃbhṛtidyuniveśaprabhṛtayo brahmaṇo vibhūtayaḥ paṭhyante /
GSP33brssbh3u:2019: tāsu brahmavidyāsu tā brahmavibhūtaya upasaṃhriyeranna veti vicāraṇāyāṃ brahmasaṃbandhādupasaṃhāraprāptāvevaṃ paṭhati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2022: tathāhi śāṇḍilyavidyāyāṃ hṛdayāyatanatvaṃ brahmaṇa uktam - 'eṣa ma ātmāntarhṛdaye' (chā. 3.14.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2023: tadvadeva daharavidyāyāmapi 'daharaṃ puṇḍarīke veśma daharo 'sminnantarākāśaḥ' (chā. 8.1.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2024: upakosalavidyāyāṃ tvakṣyāyatanatvam 'ya eṣo 'kṣaṇi puruṣo dṛśyate' (chā. 4.15.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2025: evaṃ tatra tatrat tadādhyātmikamāyatanametāsu vidyāsu pratīyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2026: ādhidaivikyastvetā vibhūtayaḥ saṃbhṛtidyuvyāptiprabhṛtayastāsāṃ kuta etāsu prāptiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2028: 'eṣa u eva bhāmanīreṣa hi sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti' (chā. 4.15.4)
GSP33brssbh3u:2029: 'yāvānvā ayamākāśastāvāneṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśa ubhe asmindyāvāpṛthivī antareva samāhite' (chā. 8.1.3)
GSP33brssbh3u:2031: santi cānyā āyatanaviśeṣahīnā apīha brahmavidyāḥ ṣoḍaśakalādyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2034: samānaguṇāmnānena hi pratyupasthāpitāsu viprakṛṣṭadeśāsvapi vidyāsu viprakṛṣṭadeśā guṇā upasaṃhriyeranniti yuktam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2035: saṃbhṛtyādayastu śāṇḍilyādivākyagocarāśca manomayatvādayo guṇāḥ parasparavyāvṛttasvarūpatvānna pradeśāntaravartividyāpratyupasthāpanamityucyate vidyābhede 'pi tadupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2036: ekamapi hi brahma vibūtibhedairanekadhopāsyata iti sthitiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2043: asti tāṇḍināṃ paiṅgināṃ ca rahasyabrāhmaṇe puruṣavidyā /
GSP33brssbh3u:2048: taittirīyakā api kañcitpuruṣayajñaṃ kalpayanavti - 'tasyaivaṃ viduṣo yajñasyātmā yajamānaḥ śraddhā patnī' (nārā. 80)
GSP33brssbh3u:2050: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ ya itaratroktāḥ puruṣayajñasya dharmāste taittirīyakeṣūpasaṃhartavyāḥ kiṃvā nopasaṃhartavyā iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2055: yathaikeṣāṃ śākhināṃ tāṇḍināṃ paiṅgināṃ ca puruṣavidyāyāmāmnānaṃ naivamitareṣāṃ taittirīyāṇāmāmnānamasti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2057: yadapi savanasaṃpādanaṃ tadapītaravilakṣaṇameva 'yatprātarmadhyandinaṃsāyaṃ ca tāni' (nārā. 80) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2058: yadapi kiñcinmaraṇāvabhṛthatvādisāmyaṃ tadapyalpīyastavādbhūyasā vailakṣaṇyenābhibhūyamānaṃ na pratyabhijñāpanakṣamam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2060: viduṣo yajñasyeti hi nacaite samānādhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭhyau vidvāneva yoyajñastasyeti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2062: vyadhikaraṇe tvete ṣaṣṭhyau viduṣo yo yajñastasyeti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2064: satyāṃ ca gatau mukhya evārtha āśrayitavyo na bhāktaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2065: ātmā yajamāna iti ca yajamānatvaṃ puruṣasya nirbruvanvaiyadhikaraṇyenaivāsya yajñasaṃbandhaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2066: apica tasyaivaṃviduṣaiti siddhavadanuvādaśrutau satyāṃ puruṣasya yajñabhāvamātmādīnāṃ ca yajamānādibhāvaṃ pratipitsamānasya vākyabhedaḥ syāt
GSP33brssbh3u:2067: apica saṃsanyāsāmātmavidyāṃ purastādupadiśyānantaraṃ tasyaivaṃviduṣa ityādyanukramaṇaṃ phasyantaḥ pūrvaśeṣa evaiṣa āmnāyo na svatantra iti pratīmaḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:2070: āyurabhivṛddhiphalo hyasau 'sa ha --ṣoḍaśaṃ varṣaśataṃ jīvati ya evaṃ veda' (chā. 3.16.7)
GSP33brssbh3u:2075: astyātharvaṇikānāmupaniṣadārambhe mantrasamāmnāyaḥ - 'sarvaṃ pravidhya hṛdayaṃ pravidhya dhamanīḥ pravṛjya śiro 'bhipravṛjyatridhā vipṛktaḥ' ityādiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2078: kaṭhānāṃ taittirīyāṇāṃ - 'śaṃ no mitraḥ śaṃ varuṇaḥ' (tai. 1.1.1) ityādiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2079: vājasaneyināṃ tūpaniṣadārambhe pravargyabrāhmaṇaṃ paṭhyate - 'devā ha vai niṣeduḥ' ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:2080: kauṣītakināmapyagniṣṭomabrāhmaṇam - 'brahma vā agniṣṭomo brahmaiva tadaharbrahmaṇaiva te brahmopayanti te 'mṛtatvamāpnuvanti ya etadaharupayanti' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2081: kimime sarve pravidhyamādayo mantrāḥ pravargyādīni ca karmāṇi vidyāsūpasaṃhriyerankiṃvā nopasaṃhriyeranniti mīmāṃsāmahe /
GSP33brssbh3u:2082: kiṃ tāvannaḥ pratibhāti upasaṃhāra evaiṣāṃ vidyāsviti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2089: nanu naiṣāṃ mantrāṇāṃ vidyāviṣayaṃ kiñcitsāmarthyaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2090: kathaṃ ca pravargyādīni karmāṇyanyārthatvenaiva viniyuktāni santi vidyārthatvenāpi pratipadyemahīti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2092: sāmarthyaṃ tāvanmantrāṇāṃ vidyāviṣayamapi kiñcicchakyaṃ kalpayituṃ hṛdayādisaṃkīrtanāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2093: hṛdayādīni hi prayeṇopāsaneṣvāyatanādibhāvenopadiṣṭāni taddvāreṇa ca hṛdayaṃ pravidhyetyevañjātīyakānāṃ mantrāṇāmupapannamupāsanāṅgatvam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2096: tathā pravargyādīnāṃ karmaṇāmanyatrāpi viniyuktānāṃ satāmaviruddho vidyāsu viniyogo vājapeya iva bṛhaspatisavasyeti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2101: hṛdayaṃ pravidhyetyevañjātīyakānāṃ hi mantrāṇāṃ yer'thā hṛdayavedhādayo bhinnā anabhisaṃbaddhāsta upaniṣaduditābhirvidyābhiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2105: hṛdayamātrasaṃkīrtanasya hyevamupayogaḥ kathañcidutprekṣyeta naca hṛdayamātramatra mantrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2106: hṛdayaṃ pravidhya dhamanīḥ pravṛjyetyevañjātīyako hi na sakalo mantrārthe vidyābhirabhisaṃbadhyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2107: ābhicārikaviṣayo hyeṣor'thastasmādābhicārikeṇa karmaṇā sarvaṃ pravidhyetyetasya mantrasyābhisaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2109: evamanyeṣāmapi mantrāṇāṃ keṣācilliṅgena keṣāñcidvacanena keṣāñcitpramāṇāntareṇātyevamarthāntareṣu viniyuktānāṃ rahasyapaṭhitānāmapi satāṃ na saṃnidhimātreṇa vidyāśeṣatvopapattiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2110: durbalo hi saṃnidhiḥ śrutyādibhya ityuktaṃ prathame tantre 'śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇasthānasamākhyānāṃ samavāye pāradaurbalyamarthaviprakarṣāt' (jai. sū. 3.3.13) ityatra /
GSP33brssbh3u:2113: vājapeye tu bṛhaspatisavasya spaṣṭaṃ viniyogāntaram - 'vājapeyeneṣṭvā bṛhaspatisavena yajeta' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2114: api caiko 'yaṃ pravargyaḥ sakṛdutpanno balīyasā pramāṇenānyatra viniyukto na durbalena pramāṇenānyatrāpi viniyogamarhati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2115: agṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatve hi pramāṇayoretadevaṃ syānnatu balavadabalavatoḥ pramāṇayoragṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatā saṃbhavati balavadabalavattvaviśeṣādeva /
GSP33brssbh3u:2116: tasmādevañjātīyakānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ vā na saṃnidhipāṭhamātreṇa vidyāśeṣatvamāśaṅkitavyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2119: hānau tūpāyanaśabdaśeṣatvāt kuśāc chandaḥstutyupagānavat tad uktam / BBs_3,3.26 /
GSP33brssbh3u:2120: asti tāṇḍānāṃ śrutiḥ - 'aśva iva romāṇi vidhūya pāpaṃ candra iva rāhormukhātpramucya dhūtvā śarīramakṛtaṃ kṛtātmā brahmalokamabhisaṃbhavāmi' (chā. 8.13.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2121: tathātharṇikānāma 'tathā vidvānnāmarūpādvimuktaḥ parātparaṃ puruṣamupaiti divyam' (muṇḍa. 3.2.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2122: tathā śāṭyāyaninaḥ paṭhanti 'tasya putrā dāyamupayanti sihṛdaḥ sādhukṛtyāṃ dviṣantaḥ pāpakṛtyām' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2123: tathaiva kauṣītakinaḥ 'tatsukṛtaduṣkṛte vidhūnute tasya priyā jñātayaḥ sukṛtamupantyapriyā duṣkṛtam' (kau. 1.4) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2124: tadiha kvacitsukṛtaduṣkṛtayorhānaṃ śrūyate kvacittayoreva vibhāgena priyairapriyaiścopāyanaṃ
GSP33brssbh3u:2125: kvacittūbhayamapi hānamupāyanaṃ ca tadyatrobhayaṃ śrūyate tatra tāvanna kiñcidvaktavyamasti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2126: yatrāpyupāyanameva śrūyate na hānaṃ tatrāpyarthādeva hānaṃ saṃnipatati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2128: yatra tu hānameva śrūyate nopāyanaṃ tatropāyanaṃ sanipatedvā na veti vicikitsāyāmaśravaṇādasaṃnipātaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2130: apicātmakartṛkaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayorhānaṃ parakartṛkaṃ tūpāyanaṃ tayorasatyāvaśyakabhāve kathaṃ hānenopāyamākṣipyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:2141: itthaṃ mahābhāgā vidyā yatsāmarthyādasya viduṣaḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛte saṃsārakāraṇabhūte vidhūyate te cāsya suhṛdviṣatsu niviśete itai /
GSP33brssbh3u:2142: stutyarthe cāsminsaṃkīrtane hānānantarabhāvitvenopāyasya kvacicchrutatvādanyatrāpi hānaśrutāvupāyanānuvṛttiṃ manyate stutiprakarṣalābhāya /
GSP33brssbh3u:2145: kathaṃ hīhaikaviṃśatādityasyābhidhīyatānapekṣyamāṇer'thavādāntare dvādaśa māsāḥpañcartavastraya ime lokā asāvāditya ekaviṃśaḥ ityetasmin /
GSP33brssbh3u:2146: tathā triṣṭubhau bhavataḥ sendriyatvāya ityevamādiṣu indriyaṃ vai triṣṭup ityevamādyarthavādāntarāpekṣā dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2147: vidyāstutyarthatvāccāsyopāyanavādasya kathamanyadīye sukṛtaduṣkṛte anyairupeyete iti nātīvābhiniveṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2148: upāyanaśabdaśeṣatvāditi tu śabdaśabdaṃ samuccārayanstutyarthameva hānāvupāyanānuvṛttiṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2152: tadyathā bhāllavinām - 'kuśā vānaspatyāḥ stha tā mā pāta' ityetasminnigame kuśānāmaviśeṣeṇa
GSP33brssbh3u:2153: vanaspatiyonitvena śravaṇe śāṭyāyanināmaudumbarāḥ kuśā iti viśeṣavacanādaudumbaryaḥ kuśā āśrīyante /
GSP33brssbh3u:2154: yathāca kvaciddevāsuracchandasāmaviśeṣeṇa paurvāparyaprasaṅge 'devacchandāṃsi pūrvāṇi' iti paiṅgyāmnānātpratīyante /
GSP33brssbh3u:2155: yathāca ṣoḍaśustotre keṣāñcitkālāviśeṣaprāptau 'samayādhyuṣite sūrye' ityārcaśruteḥ kālaviśeṣapratipattiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2157: yathaiteṣu kuśādiṣu śrutyantaragataviśeṣairanvaya evaṃ hānāvapyupāyanānvaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2158: śrutyantarakṛtaṃ hi viśeṣaṃ śrutyantare 'nabhyupagacchataḥ sarvatraiva vikalpaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2160: taduktaṃ dvādaśalakṣaṇāyām - 'api tu vākyaśeṣatvāditaraparyudāsaḥ syātpratiṣedhe vikalpaḥ syāt' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2164: na hānaṃ vidhūnanamabhidhīyate 'dhañ kampane' iti smaraṇāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2165: dodhūyante dhvajāgrāṇīti ca vāyunā cālyamāneṣu dhvajāgreṣu prayogadarśanāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2167: cālanaṃ tu suṣkṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ kañcitkālaṃ phalapratibandhanādityevaṃ prāpayya prativaktavyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2171: yadyapīdaṃ parakīyayoḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ parairupāyanaṃ nāñjasaṃ saṃbhāvyate tathāpi tatsarntanāttāvattadānuguṇyena hānameva vidhūnanaṃ nāmeti nirṇetuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2172: kvacidapi cedaṃ vidhūnanasaṃnidhāvupāyanaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ kuśāchandastutyupagānavadvidhanūnaśrutyā sarvatrāpekṣāmāṇaṃ sārvatrikaṃ nirṇayakāraṇaṃ saṃpadyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2175: aśvaśca romāṇi vidhūnvānastyajanrajaḥ sahaiva tena romāṇyapi jīrṇāni śātayati 'aśva iva romāṇi vidhūya pāpam' (chā. 8.13.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:2180: sāṃparāye tartavyābhāvāt tathā hy anye / BBs_3,3.27 /
GSP33brssbh3u:2181: devayānena pathā paryaṅ kasthaṃ brahmābhiprastitasya vyadhvani sukṛtaduṣkṛtayorvibhāgaṃ
GSP33brssbh3u:2182: kauṣītakinaḥ paryaṅ kavidyāyāmamananti 'sa etaṃ devayānaṃ pantānamāsādyāgnilokamāgacchati' (kau. 1.3)
GSP33brssbh3u:2183: ityupakramya 'sa āgacchati virajāṃ nadīṃ tāṃ manasaivātyeti tatsukṛtaduṣkṛte vidhūnute' (kau. 1.4) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2184: tatkiṃ yathāśrutaṃ vyadhvanyeva viyogavacanaṃ pratipattavyamāhosvidādāveva dehādapasarpaṇa iti vicāraṇāyāṃ śrutiprāmāṇyādyathāśruti pratipattiprasaktau paṭhati - sāṃparāya itai /
GSP33brssbh3u:2185: sāṃparāye gamana eva dehādapasarpaṇa idaṃ vidyāsāmarthyātsukṛtaduṣkṛtahānaṃ bhavatīti pratijānīte /
GSP33brssbh3u:2187: nahi viduṣaḥ saṃparetasya vidyayā brahma saṃprepsato 'ntarāle sukṛtaduṣkṛtābhyāṃ kiñcitprāptavyamasti yadarthaṃ katicitkṣaṇānakṣīṇe te kalpeyātām
GSP33brssbh3u:2188: vidyāviruddhaphalatvāttu vidyāsāmarthyena tayoḥ kṣayaḥ sa ca yadaiva vidyā phalābhimukhī tadaiva bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2190: tathā hyanye 'pi śikhinastāṇḍinaḥ śāṭyāyaninaśca prāgavasthāyāmeva sukṛtaduṣkṛtahānamāmananti 'aśva iva romāṇi vidhūya pāpam' (chā. 8.13.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:2191: iti, 'tasya putrā dāyamupayanti suhṛdaḥ sādhukṛtyāṃ dviṣantaḥ pāpakṛtyām' iti ca // 27 //
GSP33brssbh3u:2193: yadi ca dehādapasṛptasya devayānena pathā prasthitasyārdhapathe sukṛtaduṣkṛtakṣayo
GSP33brssbh3u:2200: gater arthavattvam ubhayathānyathā hi virodhaḥ / BBs_3,3.29 /
GSP33brssbh3u:2202: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ hānāvaviśeṣeṇaiva devayānaḥ panthāḥ saṃnipateduta vibhāgena kvacitsaṃnipatet kvacinneti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2204: gaterdevayānasya pathor'thavattvamubhayathā vibhāgena bhavitumarhati kvacidarthavatī gatiḥ kvacinneti nāviśeṣeṇa /
GSP33brssbh3u:2209: gantavyaṃ ca paramaṃ sāmyaṃ na deśāntaraprāptyāyattamityānarthakyamevātra gatermanyāmahe // 29 //
GSP33brssbh3u:2214: yatra hi paryaṅ kārohaṇaṃ paryaṅ kastena brahmaṇā saṃvadanaṃ viśiṣṭagandhādi prāptiścetyevamādi bahu deśāntaraprāptyāyattaṃ phalaṃ śrūyate tatrārthavatī gatiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2217: lokavaccaiṣa vibhāgo draṣṭavyo yathā loke grāmaprāptau deśāntaraprāpaṇaḥ panthā apekṣyate nārogyaprāptāvevamihāpīti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2221: saguṇāsu vidyāsu gatirarthavatī na nirguṇāyāṃ paramātmavidyāyāmityukhtam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2222: saguṇāsvapi vidyāsu kāsucidgatiḥ śrūyate yathā paryaṅ kavidyāyāmupakosalavidyāyāṃ pañcāgnividyāyāṃ daharavidyāyāmiti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2223: nānyāsu yathā madhuvidyāyāṃ śāṇḍilyavidyāyāṃ ṣoḍaṣakalavidyāyāṃ vaiśvānaravidyāyāmiti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2224: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ yāsvevaiṣā gatiḥ śrūyate tāsveva niyamyetotāniyamena sarvābhirevañjātīyakābhirvidyābhirabhisaṃbadhyateti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2228: yadyanyatra śrūyamāṇāpi gatirvidyāntaraṃ gacchecchrutyādīnāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ hīyeta sarvasya sarvārthatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2229: apicārcirādikaikaiva gatirupakosalavidyāyāṃ pañcāgnividyāyāṃ ca tulyavatpaṭhyate tatsarvārthatve 'narthakaṃ punarvacanaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2230: tasmānniyama ityevaṃ prāpte paṭhati - aniyama iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2235: iti pañcāgnividyāvatāṃ devayānaṃ panthānamavatārayantī 'ye ceme 'raṇye śraddhātapa ityupāsate' (chā. 5.10.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:2240: nahi kevalābhyāṃ śraddātapobhyāmantareṇa vidyābalameṣā gatirlabhyate 'vidyayā tadārohanti yatra kāmāḥ parāgatāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2241: na tatra dakṣiṇā yanti nāvidvāṃsastapasvinaḥ' iti śrutyantarāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2243: vājasaneyinastu pañcāgnividyādhikāre 'dhīyate - 'ya evametadvidurye cāmī araṇye śraddhāṃ satyamupāsate' (bṛ. 6.2.15) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2244: tatra śraddhalavo ye satyaṃ brahmopāsata iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2247: 'atha ya etau panthānau na viduste pataṅgā yadidaṃ dandaśūkam' (bṛ. 6.2.16)
GSP33brssbh3u:2250: samṛtirapi - 'śuklakṛṣṇe gatī hyete jagataḥ śāśvate mate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2252: yatpunardevayānasya patho dvirāmnānamupakosalavidyāyāṃ pañcāgnividyāyāṃ ca tadubhayatrāpyanucintanārtham /
GSP33brssbh3u:2258: viduṣo vartamānadehapātānantaraṃ dehāntaramutpadyate na veti cintyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2259: nanu vidyāyāḥ sādhanabhūtāyāḥ saṃpattau kaivalyanirvṛttiḥ syānna veti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2261: nahi pākasādanasaṃpattāvodano bhavenna veti cintā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2264: tathāhyapāntaratamā nāma vedācāryaḥ purāṇarṣirviṣṇuniyogātkalidvāparayoḥ saṃdhau kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ saṃbabhūveti smaranti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2265: vasiṣṭhaśca brahmaṇo mānasaḥ putraḥ sannimiśāpādapagatapūrvadehaḥ punarbrahmādeśānmitrāvaruṇābhyāṃ saṃbabhūveti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2266: bhṛgvādināmapi brahmaṇa eva mānasaputrāṇāṃ vāruṇe yajñe punarutpattiḥ śrūyate /
