GSP33brssbh3u:2267: sanatkumāro 'pi brahmaṇa eva mānasaḥ putraḥ svayaṃ rudrāya varapradānātskandatvena prādurbabhūva /
GSP33brssbh3u:2268: evameva dakṣanāradaprabhṛtīnāṃ bhūyasī dehāntarotpattiḥ kathyate tena tena nimittena smṛtau /
GSP33brssbh3u:2270: te ca kecitpatite pūrvadehe dehāntaramādadatte kecittu sthita eva tasminyogaiśvaryavaśādanekadehādānanyāyena /
GSP33brssbh3u:2272: tadeteṣāṃ dehāntarotpattidarśanātprāptaṃ brahmavidyāyāḥ pākṣikaṃ mokṣahetutvamahetutvaṃ veti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2275: yathāsau bhagavānsavitā sahsrayugaparyantaṃ jagato 'dhikāraṃ caritvā tadavasāna udayāstamayavarjitaṃ
GSP33brssbh3u:2276: kaivalyamanubhavati 'atha tata ūrdhvaṃ udetya naivodetā nāstametaikala eva madhye
GSP33brssbh3u:2279: 'tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃpatsye' (chā. 6.14.2) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2280: evamapāntaramaprabhṛtayo 'pīśvarāḥ parameśvareṇa teṣu teṣvadhikāreṣu niyuktāḥ santaḥ satyapi samyagdarśane kaivalyahetāvakṣīṇakarmāṇo yāvadadhaikāramavatiṣṭhante,
GSP33brssbh3u:2282: sakṛtpravṛttameva hi te phaladānāya karmāśayamativāhayantaḥ svātantryeṇaiva gṛhādiva
GSP33brssbh3u:2285: nacaite jātismarā ityucyante 'ta evaite' iti smṛtiprasiddheḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2286: yathāhi sulabhā nāma brahmavādinī janakena vivaditukāmākhyudasya svaṃ dehaṃ jānakaṃ dehamāviśya vyudya tena paścātsvameva dehamāviveśeti smaryate
GSP33brssbh3u:2287: yadi hyapayukte sakṛtpravṛtte karmaṇi karmāntaraṃ dehāntarārambhakāraṇamāvirbhavettato
GSP33brssbh3u:2288: 'nyadapyadagdhabījaṃ karmāntaraṃ tadvadeva prasajyeteti brahmavidyāyāḥ pākṣikaṃ mokṣahetutvamahetutvaṃ vāśaṅkyeta,
GSP33brssbh3u:2292: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmindṛṣṭe parāvare' (muṇḍa. 2.2.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2298: jñānadagdhaistathā kleśairnātmā saṃpadyate punaḥ' iti caivamādyā /
GSP33brssbh3u:2306: tathāca śrutiraviśeṣeṇaiva sarveṣāṃ jñānānmokṣaṃ darśayati 'tadyo yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tadabhavattatharṣīṇāṃ tathā manuṣyāṇām' (bṛ. 1.4.10) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2308: te paścādaiśvaryakṣayadarśanena nirviṇṇāḥ paramātmajñāne pariniṣṭhāḥ kaivalyaṃ prāpurityupapadyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2310: parasyānte kṛtātmānaḥ praviśanti paraṃ padam' iti smaraṇāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2312: karmaphale hi svargādāvanubhavānārūḍhe syādāśaṅkā bhavedvā na veti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2316: nahi 'tattvamasi' ityasya vākyasyārthastattvaṃ mṛto bhaviṣyasītyevaṃ pariṇetuṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2318: iti ca samyagdarśanakālameva tatphalaṃ sarvātmatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2320: FN: ūrdhvo vilakṣaṇaḥ brahmarūpaḥ san udgamya /
GSP33brssbh3u:2327: vājasaneyake śrūyate - 'etadvai tadakṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadantyasthūlamanaṇvahrasvamadīrghamalohitamasneham' (bṛ. 3.8.8) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:2332: tāsāṃ viśeṣapratiṣedhabuddhīnāṃ kiṃ sarvāsāṃ sarvatra prāptiruta vyavastheti saṃśaye
GSP33brssbh3u:2334: sarvatrāvaroddhavyāḥ sāmānyatadbhāvābhyām - samāno hi sarvatra viśeṣanirākaraṇarūpo
GSP33brssbh3u:2336: tadeva ca sarvatra pratipādyaṃ brahmābhinnaṃ pratyabhijñāyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2337: tatra kimityanyatra kṛtā buddhayo 'nyatra na syuḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2340: tatra vidhirūpāṇi viśeṣaṇāni cintitānīha pratiṣedharūpāṇīti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2343: yathā jāmadagnye 'hīne puroḍāśinīṣūpasatsu coditāsu puroḍāśapradānamantrāṇām agnerverhetraṃ veradhvaram ityevamādīnāmudgātṛvedotpannānāmapyadhvaryubhirabhisaṃbandho bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2346: taduktaṃ prathame kāṇḍe - 'guṇamukhyavyatikrame tadarthatvānmukhyena vedasaṃyogaḥ' (jai. sū. 3.3.8) ityatra // 33 //
GSP33brssbh3u:2352: tathā kaṭhāḥ 'ṛtaṃ pibantau sukṛtasya loke guhāṃ praviṣṭau parame parārdhe /
GSP33brssbh3u:2353: chāyātapau brahmavido vadanti pañcāgnayo ye ca triṇāciketāḥ' (ka. 3.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2361: ṛtaṃ pibantāvityatrobhayorapi bhoktṛtvameva dṛśyate tadvedyarūpaṃ bhidyamānaṃ vidyāṃ bhindyādityevaṃ prāpte bravīti vidyaikatvamiti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2366: dvā suparṇā ityatra tāvat anaśnannanyo abhicākaśīti ityaśanāyādyatītaḥ paramātmā pratipādyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2367: vākyaśeṣe 'pi ca sa eva pratipādyamno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2369: ṛtaṃ pibantau ityatra tu jīve pibatyaśanāyādyatītaḥ paramātmāpi sāhacaryācchatrinyāyena pibatītyupacaryate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2372: tadviṣaya eva cātrāpi vākyaśeṣo bhavati 'yaḥ seturījānānāmakṣaraṃ brahma yatparam' (ka. 3.2) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2376: apica triṣvapyeteṣu vedānteṣu paurvāparyalocane paramātmavidyaivāvagamyate tādātmyavivakṣayaiva jīvopādānaṃ nārthāntaravivakṣayā /
GSP33brssbh3u:2384: tatra saṃśayaḥ - vidyaikatvaṃ vā syādvidyānānātvaṃ veti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2388: tasmādyathābhyāsātkarmabheda evamabhyāsādvidyābheda ityevaṃ prāpte pratyāha - antarāmnānāviśeṣātsvātmano vidyaikatvamiti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2389: sarvāntaro hi svātmobhayatrāpyaviśiṣṭaḥ pṛcchyate ca pratyucyate ca /
GSP33brssbh3u:2393: yathāca pañcabhūtasamūhe dehe pṛthivyā āpontarā adbhyastejo 'ntaramiti satyapyāpekṣike 'ntaratve naiva mukhya sarvāntaratvaṃ bhavati tathehāpītyarthaḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:2395: yathā 'eko devaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ sarvavyāpī sarvabhūtāntarātmā' (śve.
GSP33brssbh3u:2396: 6.11) ityasminmantre samasteṣu bhūtagrāmyeṣveka eva sarvāntara ātmāmnāyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2399: anyathā bhedānupapattir iti cen nopadeśāntaravat / BBs_3,3.36 /
GSP33brssbh3u:2403: yathā tāṇḍināmupaniṣadi ṣaṣṭhe prapāṭhake - 'sa ātmā tattvamasi śvekateto' (chā. 6.8.7)
GSP33brssbh3u:2404: iti navakṛtvo 'pyupadeśe na vidyābhedo bhavatyevamihāpi bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2405: kathaṃ na navakṛtvo 'pyupadeśe vidyābhedo na bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2413: iti dvitīye praśna evakāraṃ prayuñjānaḥ pūrvapraśnagatamevārthamuttaratrānukṛṣyamāṇaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2420: tathā - 'tadyo 'haṃ so 'sau yo 'sau so 'ham' ityādityapuruṣaṃ prakṛtyaitareyiṇaḥ samāmananti,
GSP33brssbh3u:2421: tathā jābālāḥ tvaṃ vā ahamasmi bhagavo devate 'haṃ vai tvamasi' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2422: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimiha vyatihāreṇobhayarūpā matiḥ kartavyotaikarūpaiveti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2425: yadi caivaṃ cintayitavyo viśeṣaḥ parikalpyeta saṃsāriṇastāvadīśvarātmamīśvarasya saṃsīryātmatvamiti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2426: tatra saṃsāriṇastāvadīśvarātmatva utkarṣo bhavedīśvarasya tu saṃsāryātmatve nikarṣaḥ kutaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2431: tathāhi viśiṃṣanti samāmnātāra ubhayoccāraṇena 'tvamahamasmyahaṃ ca tattvamasi' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2440: kiṃ tarhi vyatihāreṇeha dvirūpā matiḥ kartavyā vacanaprāmāṇyānnaikarūpetyetāvadupapādayāmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2442: yathādhyānārtho 'pi satyakāmādiguṇopadeśe tadguṇa īśvaraḥ prasiddhyati tadvat /
GSP33brssbh3u:2443: tasmādayamādhyātavyo vyatihāraḥ samāne ca viṣaya upasaṃhartavyo bhavatīti // 37 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh3u:2447: 'sa yo haitaṃ mahadyakṣaṃ prathamajaṃ veda brahma' (bṛ. 5.4.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:2449: sa ādityo ya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣo yaścāyaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣanpuruṣaḥ' (bṛ. 5.5.2) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:2450: tatra saṃśayaḥ -' kiṃ dve ete satyavidye kiṃvaikaiveti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2462: yatra tu vispaṣṭātkāraṇāntarādvidyābhedaḥ pratīyate tatraitadevaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2463: atra tūkṣayā saṃbhave tadyattatsatyamiti prakṛtākarṣaṇātpūrvavidyāsaṃbaddameva satyamuttaratrākṛṣyata ityekavidyātvaniścayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2466: apicārthavādādeva phale kalpayitavye sati vidyaikatve cāvayaveṣu śrūyamāṇāni bahūnyapi phalānyavayavinyāmeva vidyāyāmupasaṃhartavyāni bhavanti
GSP33brssbh3u:2467: tasmātsaiveyamekā satyavidyā tena tena viśeṣaṇopetāmnātetyataḥ sarva eva satyādayo guṇā ekasminneva prayoga upasaṃhartavyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2469: chāndogye ca - 'atha ya eṣo 'ntarāditye hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣo dṛśyate' (chā. 1.6.6)
GSP33brssbh3u:2473: chāndogye hi jyotiṣṭomakarmasamabandhinīyamudgīthavyapāśrayā vidyā vijñāyate tatra hyadimadhyāvasāneṣu hi karmasaṃbandhacihnāni bhavanti 'iyamevargagniḥ sāma' (chā. 1.6.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:2484: atha yadidamasminbrahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminnantarākāśaḥ (chā. 8.1.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:2485: iti prastutya chandogā adhīyate 'eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyurviśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ' (chā. 8.1.5) ityādi
GSP33brssbh3u:2486: tathā vājasaneyinaḥ - sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmā yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu ya eṣo 'ntarhadaya ākāśastasmiñchete sarvasya vaśī (bṛ. 4.4.22) ityādi
GSP33brssbh3u:2487: tatra vidyaikatvaṃ parasparaguṇayogaśca kiṃ vā neti saṃśaye vidyaikatvamiti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2491: yadetaccāndogye hṛdayākāśasya satyakāmatvādiguṇajātamulabhyate taditaratra vājasaneyake vaśitvādyupalabhyate tadapītaratra chāndogye eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā (chā. 8.1.5)
GSP33brssbh3u:2494: samānaṃ hyubhayamatrāpi hṛdayamātanaṃ samānaśca vedya īśvaraḥ samānaṃ ca tasya setutvaṃ lokāsaṃbhedaprayojanamityevamādi bahu sāmānyaṃ dṛśyate
GSP33brssbh3u:2496: ñapi dṛśyate chāndogye hṛdayākāśasya guṇayogo vājasaneyake tvākāśāśrayasya brahmaṇa iti / na /
GSP33brssbh3u:2500: saguṇā hi brahmavidyā chāndogya upadiśyate 'atha ya ihātmānamanuvidya vrajantyetāṃśca satyānkāmān' (chā. 8.1.6)
GSP33brssbh3u:2502: vājasaneyake tu nirguṇameva paraṃ brahmopadiśyamānaṃ dṛśyate 'ata ūrdhvaṃ vimokṣāya brūhi' (bṛ. 4.3.14)
GSP33brssbh3u:2505: vaśitvādi tu tatstutyarthameva guṇajātaṃ vājasaneyake saṃkīrtyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2508: guṇavatastu brahmaṇa ekatvādvibhūtipradarśanāyāyaṃ guṇopasaṃhāraḥ sūtrito nopāsanāyeti draṣṭavyam // 39 //
GSP33brssbh3u:2511: chāndogye vaiśvānaravidyāṃ prakṛtya śrūyate - 'tadyadbhaktaṃ prathamamāgacchettaddhomīyaṃ sa yāṃ prathamāmāhutiṃ juhuyāttāṃ juhuyātprāṇasya svāhā' (chā. 5.19.1) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:2513: tāsu ca parastādagnihotraśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ 'ya etadevaṃ vidvānagnihotraṃ juhoti' (chā. 5.24.2)
GSP33brssbh3u:2516: tatredaṃ vicāryate - kiṃ bhojanalope lopaḥ prāṇāgnihotrasyotālopa itai /
GSP33brssbh3u:2522: yathā ha vai svayamahutvāgnihotraṃ parasya juhuyādevaṃ tat' ityatithibhojanasya prāthamyaṃ ninditvā svāmibhojanaṃ prathamaṃ prāpayantī prāṇāgnihotra ādaraṃ karoti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2523: yā hi na prāthamyalopaṃ sahate netarāṃ sā prāthamyavato 'gnihotrasya lopaṃ sahateti manyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2537: tā aprayojakalakṣaṇāpannāḥ satyaḥ kathaṃ bhojanalope dravyāntaraṃ pratinidhāpayeyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2539: kuṇḍapāyināmayane hi māsāgnihotraṃ juhotīti vidhyuddeśagato 'gnihotraśabdastadvadbhāvaṃ vidāpayediti yuktā taddharmaprāptiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2547: ata eva cehāpi sāṃpādikānyevāgnihotrāṅgāni darśayati - 'ura eva vedirlomāni bahurhṛdayaṃ gārhapatyo mano 'nvāhāryapacana āsyamāhavanīyaḥ' (chā. 5.18.2) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2562: kiṃ tāni nityānyeva syuḥ karmasu parṇamayītvādivadutānityāni godohanādivaditi vicārayāmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2566: yattveṣāṃ svavākyeṣu phalaśravaṇam 'āpayitā ha vaikāmānāṃ bhavati' (chā. 1.1.7)
GSP33brssbh3u:2568: tasmādyathā yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavati na sa pāpaṃ ślokaṃ śṛṇoti ityevamādīnāmaprakaraṇapaṭhitānāmapi
GSP33brssbh3u:2571: yānyetānyudgīthādikarmaguṇayāthātmyanirdhāraṇāni rasatama āptiḥ samṛddhirmukhyaprāṇa āditya ityevamādīni naitāni nityavatkarmasu niyamyeran
GSP33brssbh3u:2573: tathāhyaniyatatvamevañjātīyakānāṃ darśayati śrutiḥ - 'tenobhau kuruto yaścaitadevaṃ veda yaśca na veda' (chā. 1.110)
GSP33brssbh3u:2575: prastāvādidevatāvijñānavihīnānāmapi prastotrādīnāṃ yājanādhyavasānadarsanāt 'prastotaryā devatā prastāvamanvāyattā tāṃ cedavidvānprastoṣyasi' (chā. 1.10.9)
GSP33brssbh3u:2578: api caivañjātīyakasya karmavyapāśrayasya vijñānasya pṛthageva karmaṇaḥ phalamupalabhyate
GSP33brssbh3u:2581: nānā tu vidyā cāvidyā ca yadeva vidyayā karoti śraddhayopaniṣadā tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavati' (chā. 1.1.10) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2582: tatra nānā tviti vidvadavidvatprayogayoḥ pṛthakkaraṇādvīyarvattaramiti ca tarappratyayaprayogādvidyāvihīnamapi karmaviryavaditi gamyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2586: tathā lokasāmādiṣu pratiniyatāni pratyupāsanaṃ phalāni śiṣyante 'kalpante hāsmai lokā ūrdhvāścāvṛttāśca' (chā. 2.2.3)
GSP33brssbh3u:2591: prayājādiṣu tvitikartavyatākāṅkṣasya kratoḥ prakṛtatvāttādarthye sati yuktaṃ phalaśruterarthavādatvam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2597: vākyenaiva tu juhvādyāśrayatāṃ vivakṣitvā phale 'pi vidhiṃ vivakṣato vākyabhedaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2598: upāsanānāṃ tu kriyātmatvādviśiṣṭavidhānopapatterudgīthādyāśrayāṇāṃ phale vidānaṃ na virudhyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2600: ata eva ca kalpasūtrakārā naivañjātīyakānyupāsanāni kratuṣu kalpayāñcakruḥ // 42 //
GSP33brssbh3u:2604: ityatrādhyātmaṃ vāgādīnāṃ śreṣṭho 'vadhārito 'dhidaivatamagnyādīnāṃ vāyuḥ tathā chāndogye - 'vāyurvāva saṃvargaḥ' (chā. 4.3.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:2607: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ pṛthagevemau vāyuprāṇāvupagantavyau syātāmapṛthagveti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2610: darśayati ca śrutiradhyātmamadhidaivataṃ ca tattvābhedam - 'agnirvāgbhūtvā mukhaṃ prāviśat' (ai. 2.4)
GSP33brssbh3u:2612: tathā 'ta ete sarva eva samāḥ sarvo 'nantāḥ' (bṛ. 1.5.13)
GSP33brssbh3u:2614: tathānyatrāpi tatra tatrādhyātmamadhidaivataṃ ca bahudhā tattvabhedadarśanaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2615: kvacicca 'yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ iti spaṣṭameva vāyuṃ prāṇaṃ caikaṃ karoti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2621: tathā chāndogye 'pi parastāt 'mahātmanaścaturo deva ekaḥ kaḥ sa jāgara bhuvanasya gopāḥ' (chā. 4.3.6)
GSP33brssbh3u:2622: ityekameva saṃvargaṃ gamayati na bravītyeka ekeṣāṃ caturṇāṃ saṃvargo 'paro 'pareṣāmiti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2632: 'sa yathaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇa evametāsāṃ devatānāṃ vāyuḥ' (bṛ. 1.5.22)
GSP33brssbh3u:2637: bhagnavratāni hi vāgādīnyuktāni 'tāni mṛtyuḥ śramo bhūtvopayeme' (bṛ. 1.5.21) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2641: iti cektvā 'teno etasyai devatāyai sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati (bṛ. 1.5.23)
GSP33brssbh3u:2645: tathā 'tau vā etau dvau saṃvargau vāyureva deveṣu prāṇaḥ prāṇeṣu' (chā. 4.3.4)
GSP33brssbh3u:2646: iti bhedena vyapadiśati 'te vā ete pañcānye pañcānye daśa santastatkṛtam' (chā. 4.3.8)
GSP33brssbh3u:2651: ato vacanādindrābhedācca sahapradānāśaṅkāyāṃ rājādiguṇabhedādyājyānuvākyavyatyāsavidhānācca yathānyasameva devatāpṛthaktvātpradānapṛthaktvaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2653: taduktaṃ saṃkarṣe 'nānā vā devatā pṛthagjñānāt' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2654: tatra tu dravyadevatābhedādyāgabhedo vidyate naivamiha vidyābhedo 'sti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2656: vidyaikasthe 'pi tvadhyātmādhidaivabhedātpravṛttibhedo bhavati agnihotra iva sāyaṃprātaḥkālabhedāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2660: vājasaneyino 'gnirahasye - 'naiva idamagre sadāsīt' ityetasminbrāhmaṇe mano 'dhikṛtyādhīyate 'tatṣaṭtriṃśatsahasrāṇyapaśyadātmano 'gnīnarkānmanomayāmanaścitaḥ' ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:2661: tathaiva 'vākcitaḥ prāṇacitaścakṣuścitaḥ śrotracitaḥ karmacito 'gnicitaḥ' iti pṛthagagamanīnāmananti sāṃpādikān /
GSP33brssbh3u:2662: teṣu saṃśayaḥ - kimete manaścidādayaḥ kriyānupraveśinastaccheṣabhūtā uta svatantrāḥ kevalavidyātmakā iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2663: tatra prakaraṇākriyānupraveśe prāpte svātantryaṃ tāvatpratijānīte liṅgabhayastvāditi /
GSP33brssbh3u:2664: bhūyāṃsi hiliṅgānyasminbrāhmaṇe kevalavidyātmakatvameṣāmupodbalayanti dṛśyante tadyatkiñcemāni bhūtāni manasā saṃkalpayanti teṣāmeva sā kṛtiḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:2665: 'tānhaitānevaṃvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni cinvantyapi svapate' iti caivañjātīyakāni /
GSP33brssbh3u:2670: pūrvasya kriyāmayasyāgneḥ prakaraṇāttadviṣaya evāyaṃ vikalpaviśeṣopadeśaḥ syānna svatantraḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2676: anyārthadarśanaṃ cāsatyāmanyasyāṃ prāptau guṇavādenāpyupapadyamānaṃ na prakaraṇaṃ bādhitumutsahate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2679: yathā daśarātrasya dasaṇe 'hanyavivākye pṛthivyā pātreṇa samudrasya somasya prajāpataye devatāyai guhyamāṇasya grahaṇāsādanahavanāharaṇopahvānabhakṣaṇāni mānasānyevāmnāyante /
GSP33brssbh3u:2680: sa ca mānaso 'pi grahakalpaḥ kriyāprakaraṇātkriyāśeṣa eva bhavatyevamayamapyagnikalpa ityarthaḥ // 45 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh3u:2688: vidyātmakā evaite svatantrā manaścidādayo 'gnayaḥ syurna kriyāśeṣabhūtāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2689: tathāhi nirdhārayati - 'te haite vidyācita eva' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2690: vidyayā haivaita evaṃvidaścitā bhavanti iti ca // 47 //
GSP33brssbh3u:2694: nanu liṅgamapyasatyāṃmanyasyāṃ prāptāvasādhakaṃ kasyacidarthasyetyapāsya tatprakaraṇasāmarthyātkriyāśeṣatvamadhyavasitamityata uttaraṃ paṭhati
GSP33brssbh3u:2702: tathā liṅm 'sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni cinvantyapi svapate' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2704: 'vidyācita eva' iti hi sāvadhāraṇeyaṃ śrutiḥ kriyānupraveśe 'mīṣāmabhyupagamyamāne pīḍitā syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2707: tadabhiprāyatāyāṃ hividyocita itīyatā svarūpasamakīrtanenaiva kṛtatvādanarthakamavadhāraṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssbh3u:2710: tathā 'svapate jāgrate caivaṃvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtānyetānyetānagniṃścinvanti' iti sātatyadarśanameṣāṃ svātantrye 'vakalpate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2711: yathā sāṃpādike vākyaprāṇamaye 'gnihotre 'prāṇaṃ tadā vāci juhoti - vācaṃ tadā prāṇe juhoti' (kau. 2.5)
GSP33brssbh3u:2712: iti coktvocyate - 'ete anante āhutī jāgracca svapaṃśca satataṃ - juhoti' (kauṣī. 2.5) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2714: kriyānupraveśe tu kriyāprayogasyālpakālatvena na sātatyeṣāṃ prayogaḥ kalpeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:2716: yatra hi vispaṣṭo vidhāyako liṅgādirupalabhyate yuktaṃ tatra saṃkīrtanamātrasyārthavādatvam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2717: iha hi vispaṣṭovidhyantarānupalabdheḥ saṃkīrtanādevaiṣāṃ vijñānavidhānaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2718: tacca yathāsaṃkīrtanameva kalpayituṃ śakyata iti sātatyadarśanāttathābhūtameva kalpyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2720: etena tadyatkiñcemāni bhūtāni manasā saṃkalpayanti teṣāmeva sā kṛtiḥ ityādi vyākhyātam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2721: tathā vākyamapi evaṃvide iti puruṣaviśeṣasaṃbandhamevaiṣāmācakṣaṇaṃ na kratusaṃbandhaṃ mṛṣyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2726: grahā agṛhyanta manasāstuvanmanasāśaṃsanyatkiñca yajñe karma kriyate yatkiñca yajñiyaṃ
GSP33brssbh3u:2727: karma manasaiva teṣu tanmanomayeṣu manaścitsu manomayameva kriyate' ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh3u:2729: naca pratyakṣāḥ kriyāvayavāḥ santaḥ saṃpadā lipsitavyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2731: nahyatra kriyāṅgaṃ kiñcidādāya tasminnado nāmādhyavasitavyamiti vadati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2732: ṣaṭtriṃśatsahasrāṇi tu manovṛttibhedānādāya teṣvagnitvaṃ grahādīṃśca kalpayati puruṣayādivat /
GSP33brssbh3u:2733: saṃkhyā ceyaṃ puruṣāyuṣasyāhaḥsu dṛṣṭā satī tatsaṃbandhinīṣu manovṛttiṣvāropyata iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2736: tathāhi - 'teṣāmekaika eva tāvānyānānasau pūrvaḥ' iti kriyāmayasyāgnermāhātmyaṃ jñānamayānāmekaikasyātidiśankiriyāyāmanādaraṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2737: naca satyeva kriyāsaṃbandhe vikalpaḥ pūrveṇottareṣāmiti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP33brssbh3u:2738: nahi yena vyāpāreṇāhanīyadhāraṇādinā pūrvaḥ kriyāyāmupakaroti tenottara upakartuṃ śaknuvanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2739: yattu pūrvapakṣe 'pyatideśa upodbalaka ityuktaṃ sati hi sāmānye 'tideśaḥ pravartata iti tadasmātpakṣe 'gnitvasāmānyenātideśasaṃbhavātpratyuktam
GSP33brssbh3u:2744: yathā prajñāntarāṇi śāṇḍilyavidyāprabhṛtīni svena svenānubadhyamānāni pṛthageva karmabhyaḥ prajñāntarebhyaśca svatantrāṇi bhavantyevamiti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2746: taduktaṃ prathame kāṇḍe - 'kratvarthāyāmiti cenna varṇatrayasaṃyogāt' (jai.sū. 11.4.7) iti // 50 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh3u:2755: yathā 'sa vā eṣa eva mṛtyurya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣaḥ' iti 'agnirvai mṛtyuḥ' (bṛ. 3.2.10)
GSP33brssbh3u:2757: yathā ca 'asau vāva loko gautamāgnistasyāditya eva samit' (chā. 5.4.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:2759: pareṇa ca śabdasya tādvidhyaṃ bhūyastvāt tv anubandhaḥ / BBs_3,3.52 /
GSP33brssbh3u:2760: parastādapi 'ayaṃ vāva loka eṣo 'gniścittaḥ' ityasminnanantare brāhmaṇe tāvadvadhyaṃ kevalavidyāvidhitvaṃ śabdasya prayojanaṃ lakṣyate na śuddhakarmāṅgavidhitvam
GSP33brssbh3u:2761: tatra hi -' vidyayā tadārohanti yatra kāmāḥ parāgatāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2762: na tatra dakṣīṇā yanti nāvidvāṃsastapasvinaḥ' ityanena ślokena kevalaṃ karmanindanvidhyāṃ ca praśaṃsannidaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2763: tathā purastādapi yadetanmaṇḍalaṃ tapati ityasminbrāhmaṇe vidyāpradhānatvameva lakṣyate
GSP33brssbh3u:2764: so 'mṛto bhavati mṛtyurhyasyātmā bhavati iti vidyāphalenaivopasaṃhārānna karmapradhānatā
GSP33brssbh3u:2766: bhūyāṃsastvagnyavayavāḥ saṃpādayitavyā vidyāyāmityetasmātkāraṇādagninānubadhyate vidyā na karmāṅgatvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2771: nahyasati dehavyatiriktātmani paralokāścodanā upapajadyerankasya vā brahmātmatvamupadiśyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:2772: nanu śāstrapramukha eva prathame pāde śāstraphalopabhogyasya dehāvyatiriktasyātmano 'stitvamuktam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2774: iha tu svayameva sūtrakṛtā tadastitvamākṣepapuraḥsaraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2775: ita eva cākṛṣyācāryeṇa śabarasvāminā pramāṇalakṣaṇe varṇitam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2776: ata eva ca bhagavatopavarṣeṇa prathame tantra ātmāstitvābhidhānaprasaktau śārīrake vakṣyamāḥ ityuddhāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2777: iha cedaṃ codanālakṣaṇeṣūpāsaneṣu vicāryamāṇeṣvātmāstitvaṃ vicāryate kṛtsnaśāstraśeṣatvapradarśanāya /
GSP33brssbh3u:2779: varṇitaṃ ko 'sau puruṣo yadarthā ete manaścidādaya ityasyāṃ prasaktāvidaṃ dehavyatiriktasyātmano 'stitvamucyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2781: ākṣepapūrvikā hi parihāroktirvivakṣiter'the sthūṇānikhanananyāyena dṛḍhāṃ buddhimutpādayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2783: samastavyasteṣu bāhyeṣu pṛthivyādiṣvadṛṣṭamapi caitanyaṃ śarīrākārapariṇateṣu bhūteṣu
GSP33brssbh3u:2784: syāditi saṃbhāvayantastebhyaścaitanyaṃ madaśaktivadvijñānaṃ caitanyaviśiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ puruṣa iti cāhuḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2785: na svargagamanāyāpavargagamanāya vā samartho dehavyatirikta ātmāsti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2787: yaddhi yasminsati bhavatyasati ca na bhavati tattaddharmatvenādhyavasīte yathāgnidharmāvauṣṇyaprakāśau /
GSP33brssbh3u:2789: upalabhyamānā bahiścānupalabhyamānā asiddhe dehavyatirikte dharmiṇi dehadharmā eva bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2796: yadi dehabhāve bhāvāddehadharmatvamātmadharmāṇāṃ manyeta tato dehabhāve 'pyabhāvādataddharmatvamevaiṣāṃ kiṃ na manyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:2799: prāṇaceṣṭādayastu satyapi dehe mṛtāvasthāyāṃ na bavanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2801: apica sati hi tāvaddehe jīvadavasthāyāmeṣāṃ bhāvaḥ śakyate niścetuṃ natvasatyabhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2804: kimātmakaṃ ca punaridaṃ caitanyaṃ manyate yasya bhūtebhya utpattimicchatīti paraḥ paryanuyoktavyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2807: tarhi viṣayatvātteṣāṃ na taddharmatvamaśnuvīta svātmani kriyāvirodhāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2810: nahi bhūtabhautikadharmeṇa satā caitanyena bhūtabhautikāni viṣayīkriyeran /
GSP33brssbh3u:2814: upalabdhisvarūpa eva ca na ātmetyātmano dehavyatiriktatvam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2818: yattūktaṃ śarīre bhāvāccharīradharma upalabdairiti tadvarṇitena prakāreṇa pratyuktam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2821: evaṃ sati deha upalabdhirbhavatyasati ca na bhavatīti na dehadharmau bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh3u:2823: nacātyantaṃ dehasyopalabdhāvupayogo 'pi dṛśyate niśceṣṭe 'pyasmindehe svapne nānāvidhopalabdhidarśanāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2826: aṅgāvabaddhāstu na śākhāsu hi prativedam / BBs_3,3.55 /
GSP33brssbh3u:2832: 'ayaṃ vāva loka eṣo 'gniścitaḥ' ityevamādyā ya udgīthādikarmāṅgāvabaddhāḥ pratyayāḥ
GSP33brssbh3u:2838: iti hi sāmānyavihitānāṃ viśṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ saṃnikṛṣṭenaiva svaśākhāgatena viśeṣaṇākāṅkṣādinivṛtteḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2846: svaśākhāvyavasthāyāṃ hyudgīthamupāsīteti sāmnyaśrutiraviśeṣapravṛttā satī saṃnidhānavaśena viśeṣe vyavasthāpyamānā pīḍitā syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2855: tathāhi mantrāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ guṇānāṃ ca śākhāntarotpannānāmapi śākhāntara upasaṃgraho dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2856: yeṣāmapi hi śākhināṃ kuṭarurasītyaśmādānamantro nāmnātasteṣāmapyasau viniyogo dṛśyate
GSP33brssbh3u:2857: kukkuṭarasītyaśmādānamantro nāmnātasteṣāmapyasau viniyogo dṛśyate kukkuṭo 'sītyaśmādānamādatte kudarurasīti veti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2858: yeṣāmapi samidādayaḥ prayājaḍā nāmnātasteṣāmapi teṣu guṇavidhirāmnāyate - ṛtavo vai prayājāḥ samānatra hotavyāḥ iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2859: tathā yeṣāmapi ajo 'gnīṣomīyaḥ iti jātiviśeṣopadeśo nāsti teṣāmapi tadviṣayo mantravarṇa upalabhyate - chāgasya vapāyā medaso 'nurbrūhi iti
GSP33brssbh3u:2860: tathā vedāntarotpannānāmapi 'agnerverhetraṃ veradhvaram' ityevamādimantrāṇāṃ vedāntare parigraho dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2861: tathābahvṛcapaṭhitasya sūktasya yo jāta eva prathamo manasvān (ṛ.saṃ 2.6.7)
GSP33brssbh3u:2862: ityasya adhvaryave sajanīyaṃ śasyam ityatra parigraho dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:2865: bhūmnaḥ kratuvajjyāyastvaṃ tathā hi darśayati / BBs_3,3.57 /
GSP33brssbh3u:2867: ityasyāmākhyāyikāyāṃ vyastasya samastasya ca vaiśvānarasyopāsanaṃ śrūyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2868: vyastopāsanaṃ tāvat 'aupamanyava kaṃ tvamātmānamupāḥsa iti devameva bhagavo rājanniti hovācaiṣa vai sutejā ātmā vaiśvānaro yaṃ tvamātmānamupāḥse' (chā. 5.12.1) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:2869: tathā samastopāsanamapi 'tasya ha vā etasyātmano vaiśvānarasyamūrdhaiva sutejāścakṣurviśvarūpa
GSP33brssbh3u:2870: prāṇaḥ pṛthagvartmātmā saṃdeho bahulo bastireva rayiḥ pṛthivyeva pādau' (chā. 5.18.2) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:2871: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimihobhayathāpyupāsanaṃ syādvyastasya samastasya cota smastasyaiveti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2873: pratyavayavaṃ sutejaḥprabhṛtiṣūpāḥsa iti kriyāpadaśravaṇāt 'tasmāttava sutaṃ prasutamāsutaṃ kule dṛśyate' (chā. 5.12.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:2875: tato 'bidhīyate - bhūnnaḥ padārthopacayātmakasya samastasya vaiśvānaropāsanasya jyāyastvaṃ prādhānyamasminvākye vivakṣitaṃ bhavitumarhati na pratyekamavayavopāsanānāmapi /
GSP33brssbh3u:2877: yathā kratuṣu darśapūrṇamāsāprabhṛtiṣu sāmastyena sāṅgapradhānaprayoga evaikovivakṣyate na vyastānāmapi prayogaḥ prayājādīnām /
GSP33brssbh3u:2882: tathāhi - prācīnaśālaprabhṛtaya uddālakāvasānāḥ ṣaḍṛṣayo vaiśvānaravidyāyāṃ pariniṣṭhamapratipadyamānā
GSP33brssbh3u:2888: punaśca vyastopāsanaṃ vyāvartya samastopāsanamevānuvartya 'sa sarveṣu lokeṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu sarveṣvātmasvannamatti' (chā. 5.18.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:2890: yattu pratyekaṃ sutejaḥprabhṛtiṣu phalabhedaśravaṇaṃ tadevaṃ satyaṅgaphalāni pradhāna evābhyupagatānīti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2891: tathopāḥsa ityapi pratyavayavamākhyātaśravaṇaṃ parābhiprāyānuvādārthaṃ na vyastopāsanavidhānārtham /
GSP33brssbh3u:2893: kecittvatra samastopāsanapakṣaṃ jyāyāṃsaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya jyāyastvavacanādeva kila vyastopāsanapakṣamapi sūtrakāro 'numanyata iti kathayanti tadayuktam
GSP33brssbh3u:2897: spaṣṭo copāsaṃhārasthe samastopāsanāvagame tadabhāvasya pūrvapakṣe vaktumaśakyatvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:2901: pūrvasminnadhikaraṇe satyamapi sutejaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ phalabhedaśrutau samastopāsanaṃ jyāya ityuktam /
GSP33brssbh3u:2902: ataḥ prāptā buddhiranyānyapi bhinnaśrutīnyupāsanāni samasyopāśiṣyanta iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:2903: apica naiva vedyābhede vidyābhedo vijñātuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2904: vedyaṃ hi rūpaṃ vidyāyā dravyadaivatamiva yāgasya /
GSP33brssbh3u:2909: tathā eka eva prāṇaḥ prāṇo vāva saṃvargaḥ' (chā. 4.3.3)
GSP33brssbh3u:2921: śabdabhedāśca karmabhedahetuḥ samadhigataḥ purastācchabdāntare karmabhedaḥ kṛtānubandhatvāditi /
GSP33brssbh3u:2923: nanu vedetyādiṣu śabdabheda evāvagamyate na yajatītyādivadarthabhedaḥ sarveṣāmevaiṣāṃ manovṛttyarthatvābhedāt arthāntarāsaṃbhavācca /
GSP33brssbh3u:2928: tathaikasyāpi prāṇasya tatra tatropāsyasyabhede 'pyanyādṛgguṇo 'nyatropāsitavyo 'nyādṛgguṇaścāntretyevamanubandhabhedādvedyabhede sati vidyābhedo vijñāyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:2929: nacātraiko vidyāvidhiritare guṇavidhaya iti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP33brssbh3u:2932: nacāsminpakṣe samānāḥ santaḥ satyakāmādayo guṇā asakṛcchrāvayitavyāḥ /

GSP33brssbh3u:3333: pratiprakaraṇaṃ ca phalāni śrāvyate - 'āpayitā ha vai kāmānāṃ bhavati' (chā. 1.1.7)
GSP33brssbh3u:3338: pāriplavārthā iti cen na viśeṣitatvāt / BBs_3,4.23 /
GSP33brssbh3u:3339: 'atha ha yājñavalkyasya dve bhārye babhūvaturmaitreyī ca kātyayanī ca' (bṛ. 4.5.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:3351: 'pāriplavamācakṣīta' iti hi prakṛtya 'manurvaivasvato rājā' ityevamādīni kānicidevākhyānāni tatra viśeṣyante /
GSP33brssbh3u:3355: asati ca pariplavārthatva ākhyānānāṃ saṃnihitavidyāpratipādanopayogitaiva nyāyyā /
GSP33brssbh3u:3362: yathā 'sa ātmāno vapāmudakhidat' ityevamādīnāṃ karmaśrutigatānāmākhyānāṃ saṃnihitavidhistutyarthatā tadvat /
GSP33brssbh3u:3368: ateva ca vidyāyāḥ puruṣārthahetutvādagnīndhanādīnyāśramakmāṇi vidyayā svārthasiddhau nāpekṣitavyānītyādyasyaivādhikaraṇasya phalamupasaṃharatyadhikavivakṣayā
GSP33brssbh3u:3371: idamidānīṃ cintyate kiṃ vidyāyā atyantamevānapekṣāśramakarmamāmutāsti kācidapekṣeti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3372: tatrāta evāgnīndhanādīnyāśramakarmāṇi vidyā svārthasiddhau nāpekṣyanta evamatyantamevānapekṣāyāṃ prāptāyāmidamucyate sarvāpekṣā ceti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3374: nanu viruddhamidaṃ vacanamapekṣate cāśramakarmāṇi vidyā nāpekṣate ceti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3376: utpannā hi vidyā phalasiddhiṃ prati na kiñcidanyadapekṣata utpattiṃ prati tvapekṣate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3378: tathāhi śrutiḥ - 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena dānena tapasānāśakena' (bṛ. 4.4.22)
GSP33brssbh3u:3381: 'atha yadyajña ityācakṣate brahmacaryasya yajñādibhiḥ yaṃstavādyajñādīnāmapi hi sādhanabhāvaḥ sūcyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3382: 'sarve vedā yatpadamāmananti tapāṃsi sarvāṇi ca yadvadanti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3383: yadicchanto brahmacaryaṃ caranti tatte padaṃ saṃgraheṇa bravīmi' (kaṭha. 2.15)
GSP33brssbh3u:3385: smṛtirapi - 'kaṣāyapakatiḥ karmāṇi jñānaṃ tu paramā gatiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3386: kaṣāye karmabhiḥ pakke tato jñānaṃ pravartate' ityevamādyā /
GSP33brssbh3u:3388: yathāca yogyatāvaśenāśvo na lāṅgalākarṣaṇe yujyate rathacaryāyāṃ tu yujyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3389: evamāśramakarmāṇi vidyayā phalasiddhau nāpekṣyanta utpattau cāpekṣyanta iti // 26 //
GSP33brssbh3u:3390: śamadamādyupetas syāt tathāpi tu tadvidhes tadaṅgatayā teṣām apy avaśyānuṣṭheyatvāt / BBs_3,4.27 /
GSP33brssbh3u:3391: yadikaścinmanyeta yajñādīnāṃ vidyāsādhanabhāvo na nyāyyo vidhyabāvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:3392: 'yajñena vividiṣanti' ityevañjātīyakā hi śrutiranuvādasvarūpāvidyābhiṣṭavaparā na yajñādividhiparā /
GSP33brssbh3u:3393: itthaṃ mahābhāgā vidyā syādvidyārthī 'tasmādevaṃvicchanto dānta uparatastitikṣuḥ samāhito bhūtvātmaneyevātmānaṃ paśyati' (bṛ. 4.4.23)
GSP33brssbh3u:3395: nanvatrāpi śamādyupeto bhūtvā paśyatīti vartamānāpadeśa upalabhyate na vidhiḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3403: nahyayaṃ yajñādīnāṃ vividiṣāsaṃyogaḥ pūrvaṃ prāpto yenānūdyeta /
GSP33brssbh3u:3404: 'tasmātpūṣā prapiṣṭabhāgo 'dantako hi ityevamādiṣu cāśrutavidhikeṣvapi vākyeṣvapūrvatvādvidhiṃ parikalpya pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ vikṛtau pratīyetyādivicāraḥ prathame tantre pravartitaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3406: smṛtirapi bhagavadgītādyāsvanabhisaṃdhāya phalamanutiṣṭhitāni yajñādīni mumukṣorjñānasādhanāni bhavantīti prapañcitam /
GSP33brssbh3u:3407: tasmādyajñādīni śamadamādīni ca yathāśramaṃ sarvāṇyevāśramakarmāṇi vidyotpattāvapekṣitavyāni /
GSP33brssbh3u:3411: sarvān nānumatiś ca prāṇātyaye taddarśanāt / BBs_3,4.28 /
GSP33brssbh3u:3412: prāṇasaṃvāde śrūyate chandogānām - 'na ha vā evaṃvidi kiñcanānannaṃ bhavati' (chā. 5.2.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3413: tathā vājasaneyinām - 'na ha vā asyānnaṃ jagdhaṃ bhavati nānannaṃ pratigṛhītam' (bṛ. 6.1.14) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3415: kimidaṃ sarvānnānujñānaṃ śamādivadvidyāṅgaṃ vidhīyata uta stutyarthaṃ saṃkārtyata iti saṃśaye vidhiriti tāvatprātm /
GSP33brssbh3u:3416: tathāhi - pravṛttiviśeṣakara upadeśo bhavatyataḥ prāṇavidyāsaṃnidhānāttadaṅgatveneyaṃ niyamanivṛttirupadiśyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3422: ityanena vāmadevyāvidyāviṣayeṇa sarvastrayaparihāravacanena tatsāmānyaviṣayaṃ gamyāgamyavibhāgaśāstraṃ bādhyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3424: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - nedaṃ sarvānnānujñānaṃ vidhīyata iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3425: nahyatra vidhāyakaḥ śabda upalabhyate 'na ha vā evaṃvidi kiñcanānannaṃ bhavati' (chā. 5.2.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:3428: apica śvādimaryādaṃ prāṇasyānnamityuktvedamucyate 'naivaṃvidaḥ kiñcidanannaṃ bhavati' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3433: etaduktaṃ bhavati- prāṇātyaya eva hi parasyāmāpadi sarvamannamadīyatvenābhyanujñāyate taddarśanāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:3434: tathāhi śrutiścākrāyaṇasyerṣeḥ kaṣṭāyāmavasthāyāmabhakṣyabhakṣaṇe pravṛttiṃ darśayati - 'maṭacīhateṣu kuruṣu' (chā. 1.10.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:3441: tadetaducchiṣṭaparyuṣitabhakṣaṇaṃ darśayantyāḥ śruterāśayātiśayo lakṣyate prāṇātyayaprasaṅge prāṇasaṃdhāraṇāyābhakṣyamapi bhakṣayitavyamiti
GSP33brssbh3u:3449: lipyate na sa pāpena padmapatramivāmbhasā' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3455: śabdaścānannasya pratiṣedhakaḥ kāmakāranivṛttiprayojanaḥ kāṭhakānāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ śrūyate - 'tasmādbrahmaṇaḥ surāṃ na pibet' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3463: idānīṃ tu kimamumukṣorapyaśramamātraniṣṭhasya vidyāmakāmamayamānasya tānyanuṣṭheyānyutāho neti cintyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3465: ityādināśramakarmaṇāṃ vidyāsādhanatvena vihitatvādvidyāmanicchataḥ phalāntaraṃ kāmayamānasya nityanyananuṣṭheyāni /
GSP33brssbh3u:3466: atha tasyāpyanuṣṭheyāni na tarhyeṣāṃ vidyāsādhanatvaṃ nityānityasaṃyogavirodhāditi /
GSP33brssbh3u:3467: asyāṃ prāptau paṭhati - 'āśramamātraniṣṭhasyāpyamumukṣoḥ kartavyanyeva nityāni karmāṇi yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhoti' ityādinā vihitatvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:3469: atha yaduktaṃ naivaṃ sati vidyāsādhanatveṣāṃ syādityata uttaraṃ paṭhati -
GSP33brssbh3u:3471: vidyāsahakārīṇi caitāni syurvihitatvādeva 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti' (bṛ. 4.4.22) ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh3u:3476: vidhilakṣaṇaṃ hi sādhanaṃ darśapūrṇamāsādi svargaphalasiṣādhayiṣayā sahakārisādhanāntaramapekṣate naivaṃ vidyā /
GSP33brssbh3u:3481: nitye hyekaḥ saṃyogo yāvajjīvādivākyakalpito na tasya vidyāphalatvam /
GSP33brssbh3u:3484: yathaikasyāpi khādiratvasya nityena saṃyogena kratvarthatvamanityena saṃyogena puruṣārthatvaṃ tadvat // 33 //
GSP33brssbh3u:3486: sarvathāpyāśramakarmapakṣe vidyāsahakāritvapakṣe ca ta evāgnihotrādayo dharmā anuṣṭoyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3489: yathā kuṇḍapāyināmayane 'māsamagnihotraṃ jihoti' ityatra nityādagnihotrātkarmāntaramupadiśyate naivamiha karmabhedo 'stītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3493: iti siddhavadutpannarūpāṇyeva yajñādīni vividiṣāyāṃ viniyuṅ kte natu juhvatītyādivadapūrvameṣāṃ rūpamutpādayatīti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3494: smṛtiliṅgamapi 'anāśritaḥ karmaphalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ' (6.1)
GSP33brssbh3u:3496: yasyaite 'ṣṭācatvāriṃśatsaṃskārā ityādyā ca saṃskāratvaprasiddhirvaidikeṣu karmasu tatsaṃskṛtasya vidyotpattimabhipretya smṛtau bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:3500: rāgadibhiḥ kleśaiḥ 'eṣa hyātmā na naśyati yaṃ brahmacaryeṇānuvindate' (chā. 8.5.3) ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh3u:3501: tasmādyajñādīnyāśramakarmāṇi ca bhavanti vidyāsahakārīṇi ceti niścitam // 35 //
GSP33brssbh3u:3504: vidhurādīnāṃ dravyādisaṃpadrahitānāṃ cānyatamāśramapratipattihīnānāmantarālavartināṃ kiṃ vidyāyāmadhikāro 'sti kiṃvā nāstīti saṃśaye nāstīti tāvatprāptam /
GSP33brssbh3u:3506: evaṃ prāpta idamāha - antarā cāpi tvanāśramitvena vartamāno 'pi vidyāyāmadhikriyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3511: nanu liṅgamidaṃ śrutismṛtidarśanamipanyastaṃ kā nu khalu prāptiriti sābhidhīyate -
GSP33brssbh3u:3514: tathāca smṛtiḥ - 'japyenaiva tu saṃsiddhyedbrāhmaṇo nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3515: kuryādantra vā kuryānmantro brāhmaṇa ucyate' ityasaṃbhavadāśramakarmāṇo 'pi japye 'dhikāraṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:3521: atas tv itarajjyāyo liṅgāc ca / BBs_3,4.39 /
GSP33brssbh3u:3526: saṃvatsaramanāśramī sthitvā kṛcchramekaṃ caret' iti ca smṛtiliṅgāt // 39 //
GSP33brssbh3u:3528: tadbhūtasya tu nātadbhāvo jaiminer api niyamāt tadrūpābhāvebhyaḥ / BBs_3,4.40 /
GSP33brssbh3u:3530: tāṃstu prāptasya kathañcittataḥ pracyutirasti nāsti veti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3531: pūrvakarmasvanuṣṭhānacikīrṣayā vā rāgādivaśena vā pracyuto 'pi syādviśeṣābhāvāditi /
GSP33brssbh3u:3532: evaṃ prāpta ucyate - tadbhūtasya tu pratipannordhvaretobhāvasya na kathañcidapyatadbhāvo na tataḥ pracyutiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:3535: iti 'araṇyamiyāditi padaṃ tato na punareyādityupaniṣat' iti 'ācāryeṇābhyanujñātaścaturṇāmekamāśramam /
GSP33brssbh3u:3536: ā vimokṣāccharīrasya so 'nutiṣṭhedyathāvidi' iti caivañjātīyake niyamaḥ pracyutyaprabhāvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:3541: yattu pūrvakarmasvanuṣṭhānacikīrṣayā pratyavarohaṇamiti tadasat 'śreyānsvadharmo viguṇaḥ paradharmātsvanuṣṭhitāt' (3.35)
GSP33brssbh3u:3544: yo hi yaṃ prati vidhīyate sa tasya dharmo natu yo yena svanuṣṭhātuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3550: na cādhikārikam api patanānumānāt tadayogāt / BBs_3,4.41 /
GSP33brssbh3u:3551: yadi naiṣṭhiko brahmacārī pramādādavakīryeta kiṃ tasya 'brahmacaryāvakīrṇī nairṛtaṃ gardabhamālabhet' ityetatprāyaścittaṃ syāduta neti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3555: kiṃ kāraṇam - 'ārūḍho naiṣṭhikaṃ dharmaṃ yastu pracyavate pinaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3556: prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmi yena śuddhyetsa ātmahā' ityapratisamādheyapatanasmaraṇācchinnaśirasa iva pratikriyānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3558: upapūrvam api tv eke bhāvamaśanavat tad uktam / BBs_3,4.42 /
GSP33brssbh3u:3560: yannaiṣṭhikasya gurudārādibhyo 'nyatra brahmacaryaṃ viśīryeta na tanmahāpātakaṃ bhavati gurutalpādiṣu mahāpātakeṣvaparigaṇanāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:3564: ye hi prāyaścittasyābhāvamicchanti teṣāṃ na mūlamupalabhyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3565: ye tu bhāvamicchanti teṣāṃ brahmacāryavakīrṇetyadaviśeṣaśravaṇaṃ mūlam /
GSP33brssbh3u:3570: evaṃ bhikṣuvaikhānasayorapi vānaprastho dīkṣābhede kṛcchraṃ dvādaśarātraṃ caritvā
GSP33brssbh3u:3574: bahis tūbhayathāpi smṛter ācārāc ca / BBs_3,4.43 /
GSP33brssbh3u:3575: yadūrdhvaretasāṃ svaśramebhyaḥ pracyavanaṃ mahāpātakaṃ yadi vopapātakamubhayathāpi śiṣṭhaiste bahirkartavyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3577: prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmi yena śudhyetsa ātmahā' iti 'ārūḍhapatitaṃ vipraṃ maṇḍalācca viniḥsṛtam /
GSP33brssbh3u:3578: udbaddhaṃ kṛmidaṣṭaṃ ca spṛṣṭvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret' iti caivamādinindātiśayasmṛtibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3587: phalaṃ hi śrūyate - 'varṣati hāsmai varṣayati ha ya etadevaṃ vidvānvṛṣṭau pañcavidhaṃ sāmopāste' (chā. 2.3.2) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:3591: phalaṃ ca kartaryupāsanānāṃ śrūyate - 'varṣatyasmai ya upāste' ityādi /
GSP33brssbh3u:3592: nanvṛtvijo 'pi phalaṃ dṛṣṭam 'ātmane vā yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tamāgāyati' (bṛ. 1.3.28) iti / na /
GSP33brssbh3u:3594: tasmātsvāmina eva phalavatsūpāsaneṣu kartṛtvamityātreya ācāryo manyate // 44 //
GSP33brssbh3u:3595: ārtvijyam ity auḍulomiḥ tasmai hi parikrīyate / BBs_3,4.45 /
GSP33brssbh3u:3602: tathāca 'taṃ ha bako dālbhyo vidāñcakāra sa ha naimiśīyānāmudgātā babhūva (chā. 1.2.13)
GSP33brssbh3u:3608: yāṃ vai kāñcana yajña ṛtvija āśiṣamāśāsata iti yajamānāyaiva tāmāśāsata iti hovāceti tasmādu haivaṃvidudgātā brūyātkaṃ te kāmamāgāyāni (chā. 1.7.8 - 9) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3612: sahakāryantaravidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyaṃ tadvato vidhyādivat / BBs_3,4.47 /
GSP33brssbh3u:3613: 'tasmādbrahmaṇaḥ pāṇḍityaṃ nirvidya bālyena tiṣṭhāsedbālyaṃ ca pāṇḍityaṃ ca nirvidyātha muniramaunaṃ ca monaṃ ca nirvidyātha brāhmaṇaḥ' (bṛ.
GSP33brssbh3u:3615: tatra saṃśayaḥ maunaṃ vidīyate na veti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3618: nahyatha munirityatra vidāyakā vibhaktirupalabhyate tasmādayamanuvādo yuktaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3621: apicāmaunaṃ ca maunaṃ ca nirvidyātha brāhmaṇa ityatra tāvanna brāhmaṇatvaṃ vidhīyate prāgeva prāptatvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:3622: tasmādatha brāhmaṇa iti praśaṃsāvadastathaivātha munirityapi bhavitumarhati samānanirdeṣatvāditi /
GSP33brssbh3u:3631: nanu muniśabda uttamāśramavacano 'pi śrūyate 'gārhasthyamācāryakulaṃ maunaṃ vānaprastham' ityatra / na /
GSP33brssbh3u:3633: itarāśramasaṃnidhānāttu pāriśeṣyāttatrottamāśramopādānaṃ jñānapradhānatvādutmāśramasyaṣa tasmādbālyapāṇḍityāpekṣayā tṛtīyamidaṃ maunaṃ jñānātiśayarūpaṃ vidīyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3634: yattu bālya eva vidheḥ paryavasānamiti tathāpyapūrvatvānmunitvasya vidheyatvāmāśrīyate muniḥ syāditi /
GSP33brssbh3u:3638: tadadhikārāt 'ātmānaṃ viditvā putrādyeṣaṇābhyo vyutthāyātha bhikṣācaryaṃ caranti' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3639: nanu sati vidyāvattve prāpnotyeva tatrātiśayaḥ kiṃ monavidhinetyata āha - pakṣeṇeti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3643: yathā - 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta' ityevañjātīyake vidhyādau sahakāritvenāgnyanbādhānādikamaṅgajātaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3645: evaṃ bālyādiviśiṣṭe kaivalyāśrame śrutimati vidyamāne kasmācchāndogye gṛhiṇopasaṃhāraḥ 'abhisamāvṛtya kuṭumbe' (chā. 8.15.1) ityatra /
GSP33brssbh3u:3651: bahulāyāsāni hi bahūnyāśramakarmāṇi yajñādīni taṃ prati kartavyatayopadiṣṭānyāśramāntarakarmāṇi ca yathāsaṃbhavamahiṃsendriyasaṃyamādīni tasya vidyante /
GSP33brssbh3u:3654: yathā maunaṃ gārhasthyaṃ caitāvāśramau śrutimantāvevamitarāvapi vānaprasthagurukulavāsau /
GSP33brssbh3u:3655: darśitā hi purastācchrutiḥ- 'tapaḥ eva dvitīyo brahmacaryācāryakulavāsī tṛtīyaḥ' (chā. 2.23.1) ityādyā /
GSP33brssbh3u:3662: tatra bālasya bhāvaḥ karma vā bālyamitiraddhite sati bālabhāvasya vayoviśeṣasyecchāyā
GSP33brssbh3u:3665: kiṃ tāvatprāptaṃ kāmacāravādabhakṣaṇatā yathopapādamūtrapurīṣatvaṃ ca prasiddhataraṃ loke bālyamiti tadgrahaṇaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssbh3u:3670: aviruddhe hyanyasminbālyaśabdābhilapye labhyamāne na vidhyantaravyāghātakalpanā yuktā /
GSP33brssbh3u:3679: tathācoktaṃ smṛtikāraiḥ - 'yaṃ na santaṃ na cāsantaṃ nāśrutaṃ na bahuśrutam /
GSP33brssbh3u:3680: na suvṛttaṃ na durvṛttaṃ veda kaścitsa brāhmaṇaḥ //
GSP33brssbh3u:3688: tatphalaṃ vidyā siddhyantī kimihaiva janmani siddhyatyuta kadācidamutrāpīti cnavtyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3693: naca kaścidamutra me vidyā jāyatāmityabhisaṃdhāya śravaṇādiṣu pravartate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3694: samāna eva tu janmani vidyājanmābhisaṃdhāyaiteṣu pravartamāno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3697: evaṃ prāpte vadāmaḥ - aihikaṃ vidyājanma bhavatyasati prastutapratibandha iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3698: etadapaktaṃ bhavati - yadā prakrāntasya vidyāsādhanasya kaścitpratibandho na kriyata upasthitavipākena karmāntareṇa tadehaiva vidyotpadyate,
GSP33brssbh3u:3699: yadā tu khalu tatpratibandhaḥ kriyate tadāmutreti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3701: yāni cākasya karmaṇo vipācakāni deśakālanimittāni tānyevānyasyāpīti na niyantuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh3u:3703: śāstramapyasya karmaṇa idaṃ phalaṃ bhavatītyetāvati paryavasitaṃ na deśakālanimittaviśeṣamapi saṃkārtayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:3705: nacāviśeṣeṇa vidyāyāmabhisaṃdhirnotpadyata ihāmutra vā me vidyā jāyatāmityabhisaṃdherniraṅ kuśatvāt /
GSP33brssbh3u:3707: tathācaśrutirdurbodhatvamātmano darśayati - 'śravaṇāyāpi bahubhiryo na labhyaḥ śṛṇvanto 'pi bahavo yaṃ na vidyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3708: āścaryo 'sya vaktā kuśalo 'sya labdhāścaryo jñātā kuśalānuśiṣṭaḥ' (ka. 2.7) iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3709: garbhasya eva ca vāmadevaḥ pratipede brahmabhāvamiti vadantī janmāntarasaṃcitātsādhanājjanmāntare vidyotpattiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh3u:3711: samṛtāvapi - 'aprāpya yogasaṃsiddhiṃ kāṃ gatiṃ kṛṣṇa gacchati' (gī. 6.36)
GSP33brssbh3u:3712: ityarjunena pṛṣṭo bhagavānvāsudevaḥ 'nahi kalyāṇakṛtkaściddurgatiṃ tāta gacchati' (gī. 6.40)
GSP33brssbh3u:3713: ityuktvā punastasya puṇyalokaprāptiṃ sādhukule saṃbūtiṃ cābhidhāyānantaram 'tatra taṃ buddhisaṃyogaṃ labhate paurvadehikam' (gī.
GSP33brssbh3u:3719: yathā mumukṣorvidyāsādhanāvalambinaḥ sādhanavīryaviśeṣādvidyalakṣaṇe phala aihikāmuṣmikaphalatvakṛto viśeṣapratiniyamo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3722: na khalu muktiphale kaścidevaṃbhūto viśeṣapratiniyama āśaṅkitavyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh3u:3734: apica vidyāsādhanaṃ svavīryaviśeṣāsvaphala eva vidyāyāṃ kañcidatiśayamāsañjayenna vidyāphale muktau /
GSP33brssbh3u:3736: naca tasyāmapyutkarṣanikarṣātmako 'tiśaya upapadyate nikṛṣṭāyā vidyātvābhāvādutkṛṣṭaiva hi vidyā bhavati /
GSP33brssbh3u:3742: ityādyāsu guṇāvāpodvāpavaśādbhedopapattau satyāmupapadyate yathāsvaṃ phalabhedaniyamaḥ karmaphalavat /
GSP33brssbh3u:3743: tathāca liṅgadarśanam - 'taṃ yathā yathopāsate tadeva bhavati' iti /
GSP33brssbh3u:3745: tathāca smṛtiḥ - 'nahi gatiradhikāsti kasyacitsati hi guṇe pravadantyatulyatām' iti /
